atk-s0516a:341_8: asurā. Api cettha dīghapiṭṭhikapetā nāma saṭṭhiyojanikāpi honti. Saññā pana sabbesampi
atk-s0516a:341_9: akusalavipākāhetukāva hoti. Iti āpāyikāpi nānattakāyā ekattasaññinoti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0516a:342_0: Ābhassarāti daṇḍaukkāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī
atk-s0516a:342_1: viya sarati visaratīti ābhassarā. Tesu pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyajjhānadvayaṃ parittaṃ
atk-s0516a:342_2: bhāvetvā upapannā parittābhā nāma honti. Majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā upapannā appamāṇābhā
atk-s0516a:342_3: nāma honti. Paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā upapannā ābhassarā nāma honti. Idha pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0516a:342_4: sabbe gahitā. Sabbesañhi tesaṃ kāyo ekavipphārova hoti, saññā pana avitakkavicāramattā
atk-s0516a:343_0: Subhakiṇhāti subhena vokiṇṇā, subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena ekagghanāti attho. Etesañhi
atk-s0516a:343_1: na ābhassarānaṃ viya chijjitvā chijjitvā pabhā gacchatīti. Catukkanaye tatiyassa
atk-s0516a:343_2: pañcakanaye catukkassa parittamajjhimapaṇītassa jhānassa vasena parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhā
atk-s0516a:343_3: nāma hutvā nibbattanti. Iti sabbepi te ekattakāyā ceva catutthajjhānasaññāya ekattasaññino
atk-s0516a:343_4: cāti veditabbā. Vehapphalāpi catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti. Asaññasattā viññāṇābhāvā
atk-s0516a:343_5: ettha saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti, sattāvāsesu gacchanti.
atk-s0516a:344_0: Suddhāvāsā vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhitā, na sabbakālikā, kappasatasahassampi asaṅkhyeyyampi
atk-s0516a:344_1: buddhasuññe loke na uppajjanti. Soḷasakappasahassabbhantare buddhesu uppannesuyeva
atk-s0516a:344_2: uppajjanti. Dhammacakkapavattissa bhagavato khandhāvārasadisā honti. Tasmā neva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ,
atk-s0516a:344_3: na ca sattāvāsaṃ bhajanti. Mahāsīvatthero pana “na kho pana so, sāriputta, āvāso
atk-s0516a:344_4: sulabharūpo, yo mayā anāvuṭṭhapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehīti
atk-s0516a:344_5: iminā suttena suddhāvāsāpi catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ catutthasattāvāsañca bhajantī”ti
atk-s0516a:345_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamāti ettha sabbasoti sabbākārena, sabbāsaṃ vā anavasesānanti
atk-s0516a:345_2: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu, tassa ārammaṇampi
atk-s0516a:345_3: “bahiddhā rūpāni passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsu. Tasmā idha “rūpe saññā rūpasaññā”ti
atk-s0516a:345_4: evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Rūpaṃ saññā assāti rūpasaññā,
atk-s0516a:345_5: rūpamassa nāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ
atk-s0516a:346_0: Samatikkamāti virāgā nirodhā ca. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Etāsaṃ kusalavipākakiriyavasena
atk-s0516a:346_1: pañcadasannaṃ jhānasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0516a:346_2: ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca
atk-s0516a:346_3: virāgahetu ceva nirodhahetu ca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. Na hi sakkā
atk-s0516a:346_4: sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena etaṃ upasampajja viharitunti. Tattha yasmā ārammaṇe
atk-s0516a:346_5: avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hoti, samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva
atk-s0516a:347_0: “Tattha katamā rūpasaññā? Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa
atk-s0516a:347_1: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti rūpasaññāyo. Imā rūpasaññāyo atikkanto
atk-s0516a:347_2: hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto, tena vuccati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti –
atk-s0516a:348_0: Evaṃ vibhaṅge saññānaṃyeva samatikkamo vutto. Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā
atk-s0516a:348_1: etā samāpattiyo, na ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe paṭhamajjhānādīni viya, tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi
atk-s0516a:349_0: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena
atk-s0516a:349_1: uppannā saññā paṭighasaññā, rūpasaññādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamā
atk-s0516a:349_2: paṭighasaññā? Rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā, imā vuccanti
atk-s0516a:349_3: paṭighasaññāyo”ti. Tāsaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pañcannanti sabbaso
atk-s0516a:349_4: dasannaṃ paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā, appavattiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:350_0: Kāmañcetā paṭhamajjhānādīni samāpannassāpi na santi, na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena
atk-s0516a:350_1: cittaṃ pavattati, evaṃ santepi aññattha pahīnānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne viya
atk-s0516a:350_2: sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ tatiyamagge viya ca imasmiṃyeva jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa
atk-s0516a:350_3: jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā – kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ
atk-s0516a:350_4: samāpannassa na santi, atha kho na pahīnattā na santi, na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā
atk-s0516a:350_5: saṃvattati, rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ pavatti, ayaṃ pana bhāvanā rūpavirāgāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0516a:350_6: Tasmā tā ettha “pahīnā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Na kevalañca vattuṃ, ekaṃseneva evaṃ dhāretumpi
atk-s0516a:350_7: vaṭṭati. Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭako”ti
atk-s0516a:350_8: vutto bhagavatā. Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā
atk-s0516a:350_9: ca vuttā – “āḷāro ca kālāmo arūpaṃ samāpanno pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya
atk-s0516a:350_10: atikkantāni neva addasa, na pana saddaṃ assosī”ti.
atk-s0516a:351: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ, nānattānaṃ vā saññānaṃ. Yasmā hi etā –
atk-s0516a:352: “Tattha katamā nānattasaññā? Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti –
atk-s0516a:353_0: Evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā vuttāva idha adhippetā asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā
atk-s0516a:353_1: saññā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti. Yasmā cetā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā
atk-s0516a:353_2: dvādasa akusalasaññā ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā dve akusalavipākasaññā ekādasa
atk-s0516a:353_3: kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0516a:353_4: asadisā, tasmā “nānattasaññā”ti vuttā. Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā
atk-s0516a:353_5: anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇā. Yasmā tā nāvajjati na manasikaroti na paccavekkhati,
atk-s0516a:354_0: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti,
atk-s0516a:354_1: pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle, tasmā tāsaṃ “samatikkamā
atk-s0516a:354_2: atthaṅgamā”ti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto. Nānattasaññāsu pana yasmā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā
atk-s0516a:354_3: nava kiriyasaññā dasa akusalasaññāti, imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte
atk-s0516a:354_4: bhave vijjanti, tasmā tāsaṃ “amanasikārā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāpi hi imaṃ
atk-s0516a:354_5: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati, tā pana
atk-s0516a:354_6: manasikaronto asamāpanno hotīti. Saṅkhepato cettha “rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti iminā
atk-s0516a:354_8: amanasikārā”ti iminā sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānañca pahānaṃ amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:355_0: Iti bhagavā pannarasannaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamena dasannaṃ paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamena
atk-s0516a:355_1: catucattālīsāya nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārenāti tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā
atk-s0516a:355_2: vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Kiṃ kāraṇāti ce? Sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthañceva palobhanatthañca.
atk-s0516a:355_3: Sace hi keci apaṇḍitā vadeyyuṃ – “satthā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethāti
atk-s0516a:355_4: vadati, ko nu kho etāya nibbattitāya attho, ko ānisaṃso”ti. “Te evaṃ vattuṃ mā labhantū”ti
atk-s0516a:355_5: imehi ākārehi samāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Tañhi nesaṃ sutvā evaṃ bhavissati – “evaṃ
atk-s0516a:355_6: santā kira ayaṃ samāpatti evaṃ paṇītā, nibbattessāma na”nti, athassā nibbattanatthāya
atk-s0516a:356_0: Palobhanatthañcāpi tesaṃ etissā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi visakaṇṭakavāṇijoviya, visakaṇṭakavāṇijo
atk-s0516a:356_1: nāma guḷavāṇijo vuccati. So kira guḷaphāṇitakhaṇḍasakkarādīni sakaṭena ādāya paccantagāmaṃ
atk-s0516a:356_2: gantvā “visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhatha, visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā
atk-s0516a:356_3: “visaṃ nāma kakkhaḷaṃ, yo naṃ khādati, so marati, kaṇṭakopi vijjhitvā māreti, ubhopete
atk-s0516a:356_4: kakkhaḷā, ko ettha ānisaṃso”ti gehadvārāni thakesuṃ, dārake ca palāpesuṃ. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0516a:356_5: vāṇijo “avohārakusalā ime gāmikā, handa ne upāyena gaṇhāpemī”ti “atimadhuraṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0516a:356_6: atisāduṃ gaṇhatha, guḷaṃ phāṇitaṃ sakkaraṃ samagghaṃ labbhati, kūṭamāsakakūṭakahāpaṇādīhipi
atk-s0516a:356_7: labbhatī”ti ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā nikkhantā bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā gahesuṃ.
atk-s0516a:357_0: Tattha vāṇijassa “visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti ugghosanaṃ viya bhagavato “ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0516a:357_1: nibbattethā”ti vacanaṃ. “Ubhopete kakkhaḷā, ko ettha ānisaṃso”ti gāmikānaṃ cintanaṃ
atk-s0516a:357_2: viya “bhagavā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ nibbattethā’ti āha, ko nu kho ettha ānisaṃso, nāssa
atk-s0516a:357_3: guṇaṃ jānāmā”ti sotūnaṃ cintanaṃ. Athassa vāṇijassa “atimadhuraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0516a:357_4: viya bhagavato rūpasaññāsamatikkamanādikaṃ ānisaṃsappakāsanaṃ. Idañhi sutvā te bahumpi
atk-s0516a:357_5: mūlaṃ datvā gāmikā viya guḷaṃ “iminā ānisaṃsena palobhitacittā mahantampi ussāhaṃ
atk-s0516a:357_6: katvā imaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattessantī”ti ussāhajananatthaṃ palobhanatthañca kathesi.
atk-s0516a:358_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagāti ettha nāssa antoti anantaṃ, ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsānantaṃ, ākāsānantaṃ
atk-s0516a:358_1: eva ākāsānañcaṃ, taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-s0516a:358_2: jhānassa devānaṃ devāyatanamivāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Kasiṇugghāṭimākāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:358_3: Tattha jhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭisandhivasena ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaṃ upagatā ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā.
atk-s0516a:359_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha tāva pubbe vuttanayena ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassa
atk-s0516a:359_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, vuttanayeneva ārammaṇampi. Evametaṃ
atk-s0516a:359_2: jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva
atk-s0516a:359_3: yasmā idaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharitabbaṃ, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0516a:360_0: Viññāṇañcāyatanūpagāti ettha pana “ananta”nti manasikātabbavasena nāssa antoti anantaṃ,
atk-s0516a:360_1: anantameva ānañcaṃ, viññāṇaṃ ānañcaṃ “viññāṇānañca”nti avatvā “viññāṇañca”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0516a:360_2: Ayañhettha ruḷhīsaddo. Tadeva viññāṇañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatananti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:360_3: Tattha jhānaṃ nibbattetvā viññāṇañcāyatanabhavaṃ upagatā viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā.
atk-s0516a:361_0: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva viññāṇañcaṃ āyatanamassa
atk-s0516a:361_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, vuttanayeneva ca ārammaṇampi. Evametaṃ
atk-s0516a:361_2: jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva
atk-s0516a:361_3: yasmā idaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharitabbaṃ, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0516a:362_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanūpagāti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ, antamaso bhaṅgamattampi
atk-s0516a:362_1: assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇāpagamassetaṃ
atk-s0516a:362_2: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatananti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0516a:362_3: jhānaṃ nibbattetvā ākiñcaññāyatanabhavaṃ upagatā ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā. Ayaṃ sattamaviññāṇaṭṭhitīti
atk-s0516a:362_4: imaṃ sattamaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ṭhānaṃ jānāti. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ yatheva
atk-s0516a:362_5: saññāya, evaṃ viññāṇassāpi sukhumattā neva viññāṇaṃ nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0516a:363_0: Abhūtanti abhūtatthaṃ “rūpaṃ attā”tiādivacanaṃ. Taṃ vipallāsabhāvato atacchaṃ. Diṭṭhinissayato
atk-s0516a:363_1: anatthasañhitaṃ. Atha vā abhūtanti asantaṃ avijjamānaṃ. Acorasseva “idaṃ te corikāya
atk-s0516a:363_2: ābhataṃ, na idaṃ tuyhaṃ ghare dhana”ntiādivacanaṃ. Atacchanti atathākāraṃ aññathā
atk-s0516a:363_3: santaṃ. Anatthasañhitanti na idhalokatthaṃ vā paralokatthaṃ vā nissitaṃ. Na taṃ tathāgato
atk-s0516a:363_4: byākarotīti taṃ aniyyānikakathaṃ tathāgato na katheti. Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasañhitanti
atk-s0516a:363_6: Tatra kālaññū tathāgato hotīti tasmiṃ tatiyabyākaraṇe tassa pañhassa byākaraṇatthāya
atk-s0516a:363_7: tathāgato kālaññū hoti. Mahājanassa ādānakālaṃ gahaṇakālaṃ jānitvā sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_0: Yuttapattakāle vadatīti kālavādī. Bhūtaṃ sabhāvaṃ vadatīti bhūtavādī. Paramatthaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_1: nibbānaṃ vadatīti atthavādī. Maggaphaladhammaṃ vadatīti dhammavādī. Saṃvarādivinayaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_2: vadatīti vinayavādī. Tattha diṭṭhanti aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_3: cakkhudvāresu āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ sabbākārato jānāti
atk-s0516a:364_4: passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu
atk-s0516a:364_5: labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ? Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_6: upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi
atk-s0516a:364_7: nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvipaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti vitathaṃ
atk-s0516a:364_8: natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi. Āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu tesaṃ vividhaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0516a:364_9: “diṭṭhaṃ suta”nti āha. Tattha diṭṭhanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ. Mutanti
atk-s0516a:364_10: patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. Viññātanti sukhadukkhādidhammārammaṇaṃ.
atk-s0516a:364_11: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā apattaṃ vā
atk-s0516a:365_0: Tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti iminā etaṃ dasseti – yañhi aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa
atk-s0516a:365_1: sadevakassa lokassa nīlaṃ pītakantiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0516a:365_2: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto
atk-s0516a:365_3: vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0516a:365_4: imassa sadevakassa lokassa bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ
atk-s0516a:365_5: āgacchati, mūlagandho tacagandhotiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0516a:365_6: mūlaraso khandharasotiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, kakkhaḷaṃ mudukantiādi
atk-s0516a:365_8: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano
atk-s0516a:365_9: vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0516a:365_10: lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhadukkhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvārassa
atk-s0516a:365_11: āpāthaṃ āgacchati, “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā sumano
atk-s0516a:365_12: vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:366_0: Yañhi, cunda, imesaṃ sattānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ, tattha tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0516a:366_1: vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi, imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā apattampi
atk-s0516a:366_2: atthi, apariyesitvā apattampi atthi, pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā pattampi
atk-s0516a:366_3: atthi, sabbampi tathāgatassa asampattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ. Tasmā tathāgatoti
atk-s0516a:366_4: vuccatīti yaṃ tathā lokena gataṃ, tassa tatheva gatattā tathāgatoti vuccatīti. Pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0516a:366_5: pana “abhisambuddha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ gatasaddena ekatthaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbavāresu
atk-s0516a:367_0: “Yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0516a:367_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0516a:367_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti –
atk-s0516a:368_0: Ettha yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe apparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0516a:368_1: madditvā anuttarasammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, yañca rattiṃ yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya
atk-s0516a:368_2: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi
atk-s0516a:368_3: majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-s0516a:368_4: taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnamanadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:368_5: rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ natthi, tattha vāḷaggamattampi avakkhalitaṃ,
atk-s0516a:368_6: sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya, ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya, ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya
atk-s0516a:368_7: ca tathameva hoti vitathaṃ natthi. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato…pe… sabbaṃ
atk-s0516a:368_8: taṃ tathameva hoti, no aññathā tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti. Gadaattho hi ettha gatasaddo.
atk-s0516a:369: Api ca – āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā gatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:370_0: “Yathāvādī, cunda…pe… vuccatī”ti ettha bhagavato vācāya kāyo anulometi kāyassapi
atk-s0516a:370_1: vācā, tasmā bhagavā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti, evaṃbhūtassa
atk-s0516a:370_2: cassa yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā
atk-s0516a:370_3: gatā pavattāti tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:371_0: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīcipariyantaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0516a:371_1: sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi na tassa tulā vā
atk-s0516a:371_2: pamāṇaṃ vā atthi. Atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājarājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ
atk-s0516a:371_3: atibrahmā. Aññadatthūti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. Dakkhatīti daso. Vasaṃ vattetīti vasavattī.
atk-s0516a:372_0: Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado, ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0516a:372_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca
atk-s0516a:372_2: lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo ceva
atk-s0516a:372_3: puññussayo ca agado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:373_1: jānāti. Kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇāti upādinnakhandhabhedā maraṇato paraṃ. Apāyantiādīsu
atk-s0516a:373_2: vuḍḍhisaṅkhātasukhasātato ayā apetattā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati.
atk-s0516a:373_3: Dukkarakārino ettha vinipatantīti vinipāto. Niratiaṭṭhena nirassādaṭṭhena nirayo.
atk-s0516a:373_4: Taṃ apāyaṃ…pe… nirayaṃ. Upapajjissatīti paṭisandhivasena uppajjissati. Tiracchānayoninti
atk-s0516a:373_5: tiriyaṃ añcantīti tiracchānā, tesaṃ yoni tiracchānayoni, taṃ tiracchānayoniṃ. Pettivisayanti
atk-s0516a:373_6: paccabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ visayoti pettivisayo, taṃ pettivisayaṃ. Manaso ussannatāya manussā,
atk-s0516a:373_7: tesu manussesu. Ito paraṃ kammābhisaṅkhāravasenāti ettha puññābhisaṅkhāravasena attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0516a:374_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ vināsena. Anāsavaṃ cetovimuttinti āsavavirahitaṃ arahattaphalasamādhiṃ.
atk-s0516a:374_2: arahattaphalapaññā avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. Taṇhācaritena vā appanājhānabalena
atk-s0516a:374_3: kilese vikkhambhetvā adhigataṃ arahattaphalaṃ rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, diṭṭhicaritena
atk-s0516a:374_4: upacārajjhānamattaṃ nibbattetvā vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattaphalaṃ avijjāvirāgā
atk-s0516a:374_5: paññāvimutti. Anāgāmiphalaṃ vā kāmarāgaṃ sandhāya rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, arahattaphalaṃ
atk-s0516a:375_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ dhimuttanti vimokkhenāti kenaṭṭhena vimokkho veditabboti? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0516a:375_1: Ko ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe
atk-s0516a:375_2: ca abhirativasena suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭho, pitu aṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa
atk-s0516a:375_3: sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evarūpena
atk-s0516a:375_4: vimokkhena dhimuttanti. Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ muñcitvā ākiñcaññāyatane nirāsaṅkavasena
atk-s0516a:375_5: dhimuttaṃ allīnaṃ. Tatrādhimuttanti tasmiṃ samādhimhi allīnaṃ. Tadadhimuttanti tasmiṃ
atk-s0516a:375_6: jhāne adhimuttaṃ. Tadādhipateyyanti taṃ jhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ. Rūpādhimuttotiādīni pañca
atk-s0516a:375_8: vuttāni. Lābhādhimuttotiādīni aṭṭha lokadhammavasena vuttāni. Dhīvarādhimuttotiādīni
atk-s0516a:375_9: cattāri paccayavasena vuttāni. Suttantādhimuttotiādīni piṭakattayavasena vuttāni.
atk-s0516a:376: Kammaparāyaṇanti abhisaṅkhāravasena. Vipākaparāyaṇanti pavattivasena. Kammagarukanti cetanāgarukaṃ. Paṭisandhigarukanti upapattigarukaṃ.
atk-s0516a:377_1: ñatvā “kinti palibodho aya”nti. Nandisaṃyojanaṃ itīti yā catutthaarūparāgasaṅkhātā
atk-s0516a:377_2: nandī tañca saṃyojanaṃ ñatvā. Tato tattha vipassatīti atha tattha ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattito
atk-s0516a:377_3: vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ samāpattiṃ aniccādivasena vipassati. Etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassāti etaṃ
atk-s0516a:377_4: tassa puggalassa evaṃ vipassato anukkamena uppannaṃ arahattañāṇaṃ aviparītaṃ. Vusīmatoti
atk-s0516a:378: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi, desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0516a:382_0: 85. Pannarasame mogharājasutte – dvāhanti dve vāre ahaṃ. So hi pubbe ajitasuttassa
atk-s0516a:382_1: ca tissametteyyasuttassa ca avasāne dvikkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi, bhagavā panassa
atk-s0516a:382_2: indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno na byākāsi. Tenāha – “dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissa”nti.
atk-s0516a:382_3: Yāvatatiyañca devīsi, byākarotīti me sutanti yāvatatiyañca sahadhammikaṃ puṭṭho visuddhidevabhūto
atk-s0516a:382_4: isi bhagavā sammāsambuddho byākarotīti evaṃ me sutaṃ. Godhāvarītīreyeva kira so evamassosi.
atk-s0516a:382_5: Tenāha – “byākarotīti me suta”nti. Imissā gāthāya niddese yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ
atk-s0516a:383_0: 86. Ayaṃ lokoti manussaloko. Paro lokoti taṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso. Sadevakoti brahmalokaṃ
atk-s0516a:383_1: ṭhapetvā avaseso upapattidevasammutidevayutto. “Brahmaloko sadevako”ti etaṃ vā “sadevako
atk-s0516a:384: 87. Evaṃ abhikkantadassāvinti evaṃ aggadassāviṃ, sadevakassa lokassa ajjhāsayādhimuttigatiparāyaṇādīni passituṃ samatthanti dasseti.
atk-s0516a:385_0: 88. Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena
atk-s0516a:385_1: vāti dvīhākārehi suññato lokaṃ passa. Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ uddharitvā.
atk-s0516a:386_0: Lujjatīti bhijjati. Cakkhatīti cakkhu. Tadetaṃ sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa
atk-s0516a:386_1: kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale
atk-s0516a:386_2: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Rūpayantīti
atk-s0516a:386_3: rūpā, vaṇṇavikāramāpajjantā hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Cakkhuto pavattaṃ
atk-s0516a:386_4: viññāṇaṃ, cakkhussa vā cakkhusannissitaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhuto pavatto
atk-s0516a:386_6: Vedayitanti vindanaṃ, vedanāti attho. Tadeva sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, yassa uppajjati,
atk-s0516a:386_7: taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:386_8: Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Yassa uppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Na dukkhaṃ na
atk-s0516a:386_9: sukhanti adukkhamasukhaṃ. Ma-kāro sandhipadavasena vutto. So pana cakkhusamphasse
atk-s0516a:387_0: Suṇātīti sotaṃ, taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0516a:387_1: padese sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Saddīyantīti
atk-s0516a:387_2: saddā, udāharīyantīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ, taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0516a:387_3: padese ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Gandhiyantīti
atk-s0516a:387_4: gandhā, attano vatthuṃ sūciyantīti attho. Jīvitaṃ avhāyatīti jivhā, sāyanaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:387_5: vā jivhā. Sā sasambhārajivhāya atiaggamūlapassāni vajjetvā uparimatalamajjhe bhinnauppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0516a:387_6: padese jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati. Rasanti
atk-s0516a:388_0: Kucchitānaṃ āsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. So yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye
atk-s0516a:388_1: upādinnapavatti nāma atthi, tattha yebhuyyena kāyappasādo kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ
atk-s0516a:388_2: vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamāno tiṭṭhati. Phusiyantīti phoṭṭhabbā. Manatīti mano, vijānātīti
atk-s0516a:388_3: attho. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā. Manoti sahāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ. Dhammāti
atk-s0516a:388_4: nibbānaṃ muñcitvā avasesā dhammārammaṇadhammā. Manoviññāṇanti javanamanoviññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0516a:388_5: Manosamphassoti taṃsampayutto phasso, so sampayuttāya vedanāya vipākapaccayavajjehi
atk-s0516a:388_6: sesehi sattahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Anantarāya teheva sesānaṃ upanissayeneva paccayo hoti.
atk-s0516a:389_0: Avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vāti avaso hutvā pavattasaṅkhāre passanavasena olokanavasenāti
atk-s0516a:389_1: attho. Rūpe vaso na labbhatīti rūpasmiṃ vasavattibhāvo issarabhāvo na labbhati. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0516a:390_0: Nāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyo tumhākanti attani sati attaniyaṃ nāma hoti, attāyeva ca natthi.
atk-s0516a:390_1: Tasmā “nāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyo tumhāka”nti āha. Nāpi aññesanti añño nāma paresaṃ attā.
atk-s0516a:390_2: Tasmiṃ sati aññesaṃ nāma siyā, sopi natthi. Tasmā “nāpi aññesa”nti āha. Purāṇamidaṃ,
atk-s0516a:390_3: bhikkhave, kammanti nayidaṃ purāṇakammameva, purāṇakammanibbatto panesa kāyo. Tasmā
atk-s0516a:390_4: paccayavohārena evaṃ vutto. Abhisaṅkhatantiādi kammavohārasseva vasena purimaliṅgasabhāvatāya
atk-s0516a:390_5: vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha attho – abhisaṅkhatanti paccayehi katoti daṭṭhabbo. Abhisañcetayitanti
atk-s0516a:390_6: cetanāvatthuko, cetanāmūlakoti daṭṭhabbo. Vedaniyanti vedanāya vatthūti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0516a:391_0: Rūpe sāro na labbhatīti rūpasmiṃ niccādisāro na labbhati. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0516a:391_1: Rūpaṃ assāraṃ nissāranti rūpaṃ assāraṃ sāravirahitañca. Sārāpagatanti sārato apagataṃ.
atk-s0516a:391_2: Niccasārasārena vāti bhaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānena niccasārena vā. Kassaci niccasārassa
atk-s0516a:391_3: abhāvato niccasārena sāro natthi. Sukhasārasārena vāti ṭhitisukhaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānassa
atk-s0516a:391_4: kassaci sukhasārassa abhāvato sukhasārasārena vā. Attasārasārena vāti attattaniyasārasārena
atk-s0516a:391_5: vā. Niccena vāti bhaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānassa kassaci niccassa abhāvato niccena
atk-s0516a:391_6: vā. Dhuvena vāti vijjamānakālepi paccayāyattavuttitāya thirassa kassaci abhāvato
atk-s0516a:391_7: dhuvena vā. Sassatena vāti abbocchinnassa sabbakāle vijjamānassa kassaci abhāvato
atk-s0516a:391_8: sassatena vā. Avipariṇāmadhammena vāti jarābhaṅgavasena avipariṇāmapakatikassa kassaci
atk-s0516a:392_0: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vāti “kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃ parikappikena
atk-s0516a:392_1: attanā vā attābhāvatoyeva attano santakena parikkhārena ca suññaṃ. Sabbaṃ cakkhādilokiyadhammajātaṃ
atk-s0516a:392_2: yasmā attā ca ettha natthi, attaniyañca ettha natthi, tasmā “suñña”nti vuccatīti
atk-s0516a:392_3: attho. Lokuttarāpi dhammā attattaniyehi suññāyeva, suññātītadhammā natthīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:392_4: hoti. Tasmiṃ dhamme attattaniyasārassa natthibhāvo vutto hoti. Loke ca “suññaṃ gharaṃ
atk-s0516a:392_5: suñño ghaṭo”ti vutto gharassa ghaṭassa ca natthibhāvo na hoti, tasmiṃ ghaṭe ca aññassa
atk-s0516a:392_6: natthibhāvo vutto hoti. Bhagavatā ca iti yampi koci tattha na hoti, tena taṃ suññaṃ.
atk-s0516a:392_7: Yaṃ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti, taṃ santaṃ idamatthīti pajānātīti ayamevattho vutto.
atk-s0516a:392_8: Tathā ñāyaganthe saddaganthe ca ayamevattho. Iti imasmiṃ sutte anattalakkhaṇameva
atk-s0516a:392_9: kathitaṃ. Anissariyatoti attano issariye avasavattanato. Akāmakāriyatoti attano akāmaṃ
atk-s0516a:392_10: arucikaraṇavasena. Apāpuṇiyatoti ṭhātuṃ patiṭṭhābhāvato. Avasavattanatoti attano
atk-s0516a:392_11: vase avattanato. Paratoti aniccato paccayāyattavuttito. Vivittatoti nissarato.
atk-s0516a:393_0: Suddhanti kevalaṃ issarakālapakatīhi vinā kevalaṃ paccayāyattapavattivasena pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0516a:393_1: suddhaṃ nāma. Attaniyavirahito suddhadhammapuñjoti ca. Suddhaṃ dhammasamuppādaṃ,
atk-s0516a:393_2: suddhaṃ saṅkhārasantatinti suddhaṃ passantassa jānantassa saṅkhārānaṃ santatiṃ abbocchinnasaṅkhārasantatiṃ.
atk-s0516a:393_3: Tatheva suddhaṃ passantassa saṅkhārādīni, ekaṭṭhāni ādarena dvattikkhattuṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0516a:393_4: Evaṃ passantassa maraṇamukhe bhayaṃ na hoti. Gāmaṇīti ālapanaṃ. Tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ lokanti
atk-s0516a:393_5: imaṃ upādinnakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ lokaṃ. Yadā tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ paññāya passati. Yathā
atk-s0516a:393_6: araññe tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu gaṇhantesu attānaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā gaṇhātīti na hoti, tesu
atk-s0516a:393_7: vā tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu sayameva nassantesupi vinassantesupi attā nassati, attaniyo nassatīti
atk-s0516a:393_8: na hoti. Evaṃ imasmiṃ kāyepi nassante vā vinassante vā attā vā attaniyaṃ vā bhijjatīti
atk-s0516a:393_9: apassanto paññāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ passatīti vuccati. Nāññaṃ patthayate kiñci, aññatrappaṭisandhiyāti
atk-s0516a:393_10: paṭisandhivirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhavaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ vā na pattheti.
atk-s0516a:394_0: Rūpaṃ samannesatīti rūpassa sāraṃ pariyesati. Ahanti vāti diṭṭhivasena. Mamanti vāti
atk-s0516a:394_1: taṇhāvasena. Asmīti vāti mānavasena. Tampi tassa na hotīti taṃ tividhampi tassa puggalassa na hoti.
atk-s0516a:395_0: Idhāti desāpadese nipāto, svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha – “idha
atk-s0516a:395_1: tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti. Katthaci sāsanaṃ. Yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo,
atk-s0516a:395_2: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti. Katthaci okāsaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:397: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0516a:398_0: Katthaci padapūraṇamattameva. Yathāha – “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”ti.
atk-s0516a:398_1: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo. Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana āgamādhigamābhāvā
atk-s0516a:398_3: diṭṭhipaṭisedhako neva āgamo, paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā neva adhigamo
atk-s0516a:398_4: atthi, so āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo “assutavā” iti. Svāyaṃ –
atk-s0516a:401_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhipi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha
atk-s0516a:401_1: – puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu avihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikāti puthujjanā, puthu
atk-s0516a:401_2: satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti puthujjanā, puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0516a:401_3: puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā,
atk-s0516a:401_4: puthu nānāsantāpehi santappentīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāpariḷāhehi pariḍayhantīti
atk-s0516a:401_5: puthujjanā, puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā muñchitā ajjhosannā laggā
atk-s0516a:401_6: laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā, puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvuṭā nivuṭā ovuṭā pihitā
atk-s0516a:401_7: paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā, puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:401_8: nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā, puthuva ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0516a:401_9: gato, visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janotipi puthujjano. Evametehi “assutavā
atk-s0516a:404: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:405_0: Ariyānaṃ adassāvītiādīsu ariyāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye iriyanato,
atk-s0516a:405_1: sadevakena ca lokena araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti,
atk-s0516a:405_2: buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha – “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… tathāgato ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0516a:406_0: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca “sappurisā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:406_1: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā. Sabbeva vā ete dvidhāpi vuttā.
atk-s0516a:406_2: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca paccekabuddhāpi buddhasāvakāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:407: “Yo ve kataññū katavedi dhīro, kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hoti;
atk-s0516a:408: Dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadantī”ti. ;
atk-s0516a:409_0: “Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī”ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto. Kataññutādīhi
atk-s0516a:409_1: paccekabuddhā buddhāti, yo imesaṃ ariyānaṃ adassanasīlo, na ca dassane sādhukārī,
atk-s0516a:409_2: so ariyānaṃ adassāvīti veditabbo. So cakkhunā adassāvī, ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho,
atk-s0516a:409_3: tesu ñāṇena adassāvī idha adhippeto. Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi
atk-s0516a:409_4: adiṭṭhāva honti tesaṃ cakkhunā vaṇṇamattagahaṇato, na ariyabhāvagocarato. Soṇasiṅgālādayopi
atk-s0516a:409_5: cakkhunā ariye passanti, na ca te ariyānaṃ dassāvino.
atk-s0516a:410_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito
atk-s0516a:410_1: ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito
atk-s0516a:410_2: āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi – “ariyā nāma, bhante, kīdisā”ti? Thero āha – “idhekacco
atk-s0516a:410_3: mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā saha carantopi neva
atk-s0516a:410_4: ariye jānāti, evaṃ dujjānā, āvuso, ariyā”ti. Evaṃ vuttepi so neva aññāsi. Tasmā cakkhunā
atk-s0516a:410_5: dassanaṃ na dassanaṃ, ñāṇena dassanameva dassanaṃ. Yathāha – “alaṃ te, vakkali, kiṃ
atk-s0516a:410_6: te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0516a:410_7: Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto, ariyānaṃ
atk-s0516a:410_8: adhigatañca dhammaṃ anadhigacchanto, ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā
atk-s0516a:411: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti ettha pana –
atk-s0516a:414_0: Ayañhi saṃvaravinayo pahānavinayoti duvidho vinayo. Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekamekopi
atk-s0516a:414_1: vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati. Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro
atk-s0516a:414_2: khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho. Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ
atk-s0516a:415: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0516a:419_0: Ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro. “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
atk-s0516a:419_1: nādhivāsetī”ti ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro. Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ
atk-s0516a:419_3: Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:420_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa,
atk-s0516a:420_1: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – nāmarūpavavatthānena
atk-s0516a:420_3: kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvassa, kalāpasammasanena “ahaṃ mamā”ti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena
atk-s0516a:420_4: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0516a:420_5: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanāya
atk-s0516a:420_7: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa
atk-s0516a:421_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe
atk-s0516a:421_1: sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:421_2: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0516a:421_3: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaappavattibhāvena
atk-s0516a:421_4: pahānaṃ, idaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ kilesānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:421_5: etaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0516a:421_6: nibbānaṃ, etaṃ nissaraṇappahānaṃ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:421_7: vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati. Taṃ taṃ pahānavato vā tassa
atk-s0516a:421_8: tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati. Evaṃ pahānavinayopi pañcadhā
atk-s0516a:422_0: Evamayaṃ saṅkhepato duvidho bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā, pahātabbassa
atk-s0516a:422_1: ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi, tasmā abhāvato tassa
atk-s0516a:422_2: ayaṃ “avinīto”ti vuccatīti. Eseva nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido,
atk-s0516a:422_3: sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthapi. Ninnānākaraṇañhi etamatthato. Yathāha – “yeva
atk-s0516a:422_4: te ariyā, teva te sappurisā. Yeva te sappurisā, teva te ariyā. Yo eva so ariyānaṃ
atk-s0516a:422_5: dhammo, so eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo. Yo eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo, so eva so ariyānaṃ
atk-s0516a:422_6: dhammo. Yeva te ariyavinayā, teva te sappurisavinayā. Yeva te sappurisavinayā, teva
atk-s0516a:422_7: te ariyavinayā. Ariyeti vā, sappuriseti vā, ariyadhammeti vā, sappurisadhammeti vā,
atk-s0516a:422_8: ariyavinayeti vā, sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevāti.
atk-s0516a:423_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, “yaṃ rūpaṃ, so
atk-s0516a:423_1: ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ, taṃ rūpa”nti rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ samanupassati. Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa
atk-s0516a:423_2: jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo. Yo vaṇṇo, sā accī”ti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,
atk-s0516a:423_3: evameva idhekacco rūpaṃ attato…pe… samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ “attā”ti diṭṭhipassanāya
atk-s0516a:423_4: passati. Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya
atk-s0516a:423_5: taṃ rūpavantaṃ “attā”ti samanupassati. Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā
atk-s0516a:423_6: pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati. Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva
atk-s0516a:423_7: “attā”ti gahetvā karaṇḍake maṇiṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0516a:424_1: vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ. Vedanaṃ attato… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0516a:424_2: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ “attā”ti kathitaṃ,
atk-s0516a:424_3: “vedanāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā vedanā, vedanāya vā attāna”nti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu
atk-s0516a:424_4: tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito. Tattha rūpaṃ
atk-s0516a:424_5: attato samanupassati. Vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti
atk-s0516a:424_6: pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā. Avasesesu sassatadiṭṭhi. Evamettha pannarasa
atk-s0516a:424_7: bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti. Tā sabbāpi maggāvaraṇā, na saggāvaraṇā,
atk-s0516a:425_0: Āraññikoti araññe nivāsaṃ. Pavaneti mahante gambhīravane. Caramānoti tahiṃ tahiṃ
atk-s0516a:425_1: vicaramāno. Vissattho gacchatīti nibbhayo nirāsaṅko carati. Anāpāthagato luddassāti
atk-s0516a:425_2: migaluddassa parammukhagato. Antamakāsi māranti kilesamāraṃ vā devaputtamāraṃ vā
atk-s0516a:425_3: antaṃ akāsi. Apadaṃ vadhitvāti kilesapadaṃ hantvā nāsetvā. Māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ
atk-s0516a:425_4: gatoti mārassa adassanavisayaṃ patto. Anāpāthagatoti mārassa parammukhaṃ patto. Sesaṃ
atk-s0516a:426: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi, desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadisoyeva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0516a:430_0: 89. Soḷasame piṅgiyasuttaniddese – jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇoti so kira brāhmaṇo
atk-s0516a:430_1: jarābhibhūto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā, dubbalo ca “idha pādaṃ karissāmī”ti aññatreva
atk-s0516a:430_2: karoti, vinaṭṭhapurimachavivaṇṇo ca. Tenāha – “jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇo”ti. Māhaṃ
atk-s0516a:430_3: nassaṃ momuho antarāvāti māhaṃ tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ asacchikatvā antarā eva avidvā hutvā
atk-s0516a:430_4: anassiṃ. Jātijarāya idha vippahānanti idheva tava pādamūle pāsāṇake cetiye vā jātijarāya
atk-s0516a:430_5: vippahānaṃ nibbānaṃ dhammarasaṃ ahaṃ vijaññaṃ, taṃ me ācikkha.
atk-s0516a:431_0: Abaloti balavirahito. Dubbaloti dubbalabalo. Appabaloti parittabalo. Appathāmoti
atk-s0516a:431_2: Vigacchitavaṇṇoti dūrībhūtachavivaṇṇo. Yā sā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhāti yā sā subhā
atk-s0516a:431_3: sundarā purimakāle sati, sā vaṇṇanibhā etarahi antarahitā vigatā. Ādīnavo pātubhūtoti
atk-s0516a:431_4: upaddavo pāturahosi. “Yā sā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā”ti pāṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā “yā subhā
atk-s0516a:432_0: Asuddhāti paṭalādīhi asuddhā. Avisuddhāti timirādīhi avisuddhā. Aparisuddhāti samantato
atk-s0516a:432_1: phoṭapaṭalādīhi pariyonaddhattā aparisuddhā. Avodātāti nappasannā pasannasadisā.
atk-s0516a:432_2: No tathā cakkhunā rūpe passāmīti yathā porāṇacakkhunā rūpārammaṇaṃ passāmi olokemi,
atk-s0516a:432_3: tathā tena pakārena idāni na passāmi. Sotaṃ asuddhantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Māhaṃ nassanti ahaṃ mā vinassaṃ.
atk-s0516a:433_0: 90. Idāni yasmā piṅgiyo kāye sāpekkhatāya “jiṇṇohamasmī”tiādimāha. Tenassa bhagavā
atk-s0516a:433_1: kāye sinehappahānatthaṃ “disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne”ti gāthamāha. Tattha rūpesūti
atk-s0516a:433_2: rūpahetu rūpapaccayā. Vihaññamāneti kammakāraṇādīhi upahaññamāne. Ruppanti rūpesūti
atk-s0516a:433_3: cakkhurogādīhi ca rūpahetuyeva janā ruppanti bādhiyanti.
atk-s0516a:434_0: Haññantīti ghaṭīyanti. Vihaññantīti vihesiyanti. Upavihaññantīti hatthapādacchedādiṃ
atk-s0516a:434_1: labhanti. Upaghātiyantīti maraṇaṃ labhanti. Kuppantīti parivattanti. Pīḷayantīti
atk-s0516a:434_2: vighātaṃ āpajjanti. Ghaṭṭayantīti ghaṭṭanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Byādhitāti bhītā. Domanassitāti
atk-s0516a:435_0: 91. Evaṃ bhagavatā yāva arahattaṃ, tāva kathitaṃ paṭipattiṃ sutvā piṅgiyo jarādubbalatāya
atk-s0516a:435_1: visesaṃ anadhigantvā ca puna “disā catasso”ti imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ thomento desanaṃ yācati.
atk-s0516a:436: 92. Athassa bhagavā punapi yāva arahattaṃ, tāva paṭipadaṃ dassento “taṇhādhipanne”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:437_0: Taṇhādhipanneti taṇhāya vimuccitvā ṭhite. Taṇhānugeti taṇhāya saha gacchante. Taṇhānugateti
atk-s0516a:437_1: taṇhāya anubandhante. Taṇhānusaṭeti taṇhāya saha dhāvante. Taṇhāya panneti taṇhāya
atk-s0516a:437_2: nimugge. Paṭipanneti taṇhāya avatthaṭe. Abhibhūteti maddite. Pariyādinnacitteti pariyādiyitvā gahitakusalacitte.
atk-s0516a:438: Santāpajāteti sañjātacittasantāpe. Ītijāteti roguppanne. Upaddavajāteti ādīnavajāte. Upasaggajāteti uppannadukkhajāte.
atk-s0516a:439_0: Virajaṃ vītamalanti ettha virajanti vigatarāgādirajaṃ. Vītamalanti vītarāgādimalaṃ.
atk-s0516a:439_1: Rāgādayo hi ajjhottharaṇaṭṭhena rajo nāma, dūsaṭṭhena malaṃ nāma. Dhammacakkhunti
atk-s0516a:439_2: katthaci paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ, katthaci ādīni tīṇi maggañāṇāni, katthaci catutthamaggañāṇampi.
atk-s0516a:439_3: Idha pana jaṭilasahassassa catutthamaggañāṇaṃ. Piṅgiyassa tatiyamaggañāṇameva. Yaṃ
atk-s0516a:439_4: kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti vipassanāvasena evaṃ pavattassa
atk-s0516a:439_5: dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0516a:440_0: Evaṃ idampi suttaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desesi, desanāpariyosāne ca piṅgiyo
atk-s0516a:440_1: anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi. So kira antarantarā cintesi – “evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0516a:440_2: desanaṃ na labhati mayhaṃ mātulo bāvarī savanāyā”ti. Tena sinehavikkhepena arahattaṃ
atk-s0516a:440_3: pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi. Antevāsikā panassa sahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sabbeva
atk-s0516a:444_0: 93. Ito paraṃ saṅgītikārā desanaṃ thomentā “idamavoca bhagavā”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0516a:444_1: idamavocāti idaṃ pārāyanaṃ avoca. Paricārakasoḷasānanti bāvarissa paricārakena piṅgiyena
atk-s0516a:444_2: saha soḷasānaṃ, buddhassa vā bhagavato paricārakānaṃ soḷasānanti paricārakasoḷasānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:444_3: Te eva ca brāhmaṇā tattha soḷasasu disāsu purato ca pacchato ca vāmapassato ca dakkhiṇapassato
atk-s0516a:444_4: ca cha cha yojanā nisinnā ujukena dvādasayojanikā ahosi. Ajjhiṭṭhoti yācito.
atk-s0516a:445_1: evaṃ imassa dhammapariyāyassa adhivacanaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmāni kittayanto
atk-s0516a:446_0: Niddese upāgamiṃsūti samīpaṃ gamiṃsu. Upasaṅkamiṃsūti avidūraṭṭhānaṃ gamiṃsu. Payirupāsiṃsūti
atk-s0516a:446_1: samīpe nisīdiṃsu. Paripucchiṃsūti paripucchaṃ āhariṃsu. Parigaṇhiṃsūti tulayiṃsu. “Codayiṃsū”ti keci.
atk-s0516a:448_0: Gambhīreti uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Duddaseti gambhīrattā duddase, dukkhena
atk-s0516a:448_1: daṭṭhabbe, na sakkā sukhena daṭṭhuṃ. Duddasattāva duranubodhe, dukkhena avabujjhitabbe,
atk-s0516a:448_2: na sakkā sukhena avabujjhituṃ. Santeti nibbute. Paṇīteti atappake. Idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva
atk-s0516a:448_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atakkāvacareti takkena na avacaritabbe na ogāhitabbe ñāṇeneva avacaritabbe.
atk-s0516a:448_4: Nipuṇeti saṇhe. Paṇḍitavedanīyeti sammā paṭipannehi paṇḍitehi veditabbe.
atk-s0516a:449_0: 98. Tosesīti tuṭṭhiṃ āpādesi. Vitosesīti vividhā tesaṃ somanassaṃ uppādesi. Pasādesīti
atk-s0516a:449_1: tesaṃ cittappasādaṃ akāsi. Ārādhesīti ārādhayi siddhiṃ pāpesi. Attamane akāsīti somanassavasena sakamane akāsi.
atk-s0516a:451: 101. Tasmā pārāyananti tassa pārabhūtassa nibbānassa āyatananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:455_0: 102. Pārāyanamanugāyissanti assa ayaṃ sambandho – bhagavatā hi pārāyane desite soḷasasahassajaṭilā
atk-s0516a:455_1: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, avasesānañca cuddasakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0516a:458_0: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhammadesanāya tato tato āgatā manussā bhagavato ānubhāvena attano
atk-s0516a:458_1: attano gāmanigamādīsveva pāturahesuṃ. Bhagavāpi sāvatthimeva agamāsi paricārakasoḷasādīhi
atk-s0516a:458_2: anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parivuto. Tattha piṅgiyo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha – “gacchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0516a:458_3: bhante, bāvarissa buddhuppādaṃ ārocetuṃ, paṭissutañhi tasseva mayā”ti. Atha bhagavatā
atk-s0516a:458_4: anuññāto ñāṇagamaneneva godhāvarītīraṃ gantvā pādagamanena assamābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0516a:458_5: Tamenaṃ bāvarī brāhmaṇo maggaṃ olokento nisinno dūratova taṃ khārijaṭādivirahitaṃ
atk-s0516a:458_6: bhikkhuvesenāgacchantaṃ disvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti niṭṭhamagamāsi. Sampattañcāpi
atk-s0516a:458_7: naṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, piṅgiya, buddho loke uppanno”ti? “Āma, brāhmaṇa, uppanno, pāsāṇake
atk-s0516a:458_8: cetiye nisinno amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, tamahaṃ tuyhaṃ desessāmī”ti. Tato bāvarī mahatā
atk-s0516a:458_9: sakkārena sapariso taṃ pūjetvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi. Tattha nisīditvā piṅgiyo “pārāyanamanugāyissa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0516a:459_0: Tattha anugāyissanti bhagavato gītaṃ anugāyissaṃ. Yathāddakkhīti yathā sāmaṃ saccābhisambodhena
atk-s0516a:459_1: asādhāraṇañāṇena ca addakkhi. Nikkāmoti pahīnakāmo. “Nikkamo”tipi pāṭho, vīriyavāti
atk-s0516a:459_2: attho. Nikkhanto vā akusalapakkhā. Nibbanoti kilesavanavirahito, taṇhāvirahito eva
atk-s0516a:459_3: vā. Kissa hetu musā bhaṇeti yehi kilesehi musā bhaṇeyya, ete tassa pahīnāti dasseti.
atk-s0516a:460_0: Amaloti kilesamalavirahito. Vimaloti vigatakilesamalo. Nimmaloti kilesamalasuddho.
atk-s0516a:460_1: Malāpagatoti kilesamalā dūrībhūto hutvā carati. Malavippahīnoti kilesamalappahīno.
atk-s0516a:460_2: Malavimuttoti kilesehi vimutto. Sabbamalavītivattoti vāsanādisabbakilesamalaṃ atikkanto.
atk-s0516a:462: 104. Saccavhayoti buddho hi sacceneva avhānena nāmena yutto. Brahmeti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0516a:463_0: Tattha lokoti lujjanaṭṭhena loko. Eko loko bhavalokoti tebhūmakavipāko. So hi bhavatīti
atk-s0516a:463_1: bhavo, bhavo eva loko bhavaloko. Bhavaloko ca sambhavaloko cāti ettha ekeko dve dve
atk-s0516a:463_2: hoti. Bhavaloko hi sampattibhavavipattibhavavasena duvidho. Sambhavalokopi sampattisambhavavipattisambhavavasena
atk-s0516a:463_3: duvidho. Tattha sampattibhavalokoti sugatiloko. So hi iṭṭhaphalattā sundaro lokoti
atk-s0516a:463_4: sampatti, bhavatīti bhavo, sampatti eva bhavo sampattibhavo, so eva loko sampattibhavaloko.
atk-s0516a:463_5: Sampattisambhavalokoti sugatūpagaṃ kammaṃ. Tañhi sambhavati etasmā phalanti sambhavo,
atk-s0516a:463_6: sampattiyā sambhavo sampattisambhavo, sampattisambhavo eva loko sampattisambhavalokoti.
atk-s0516a:464_0: Vipattibhavalokoti apāyaloko. So hi aniṭṭhaphalattā virūpo lokoti vipatti, bhavatīti
atk-s0516a:464_1: bhavo, vipatti eva bhavo vipattibhavo, vipattibhavo eva loko vipattibhavaloko. Vipattisambhavalokoti
atk-s0516a:464_2: apāyūpagaṃ kammaṃ. Tañhi sambhavati etasmā phalanti sambhavo, vipattiyā sambhavo
atk-s0516a:464_3: vipattisambhavo, vipattisambhavo eva loko vipattisambhavalokoti. Tisso vedanāti sukhā
atk-s0516a:464_4: vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā lokiyā eva. Āhārāti paccayā. Paccayā
atk-s0516a:464_5: hi attano phalaṃ āharantīti āhārā. Kabaḷīkārāhāro phassāhāro manosañcetanāhāro viññāṇāhāroti
atk-s0516a:464_6: cattāro. Vatthuvasena kabaḷīkattabbattā kabaḷīkāro, ajjhoharitabbattā āhāro, odanakummāsādivatthukāya
atk-s0516a:464_7: ojāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sā hi ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharatīti āhāro. Cakkhusamphassādiko chabbidho
atk-s0516a:464_8: phasso tisso vedanā āharatīti āhāro. Manaso sañcetanā na sattassāti manosañcetanā
atk-s0516a:464_9: yathā cittekaggatā, manasā vā sampayuttā sañcetanā manosañcetanā yathā ājaññaratho,
atk-s0516a:464_10: tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā. Sā hi tayo bhave āharatīti āhāro. Viññāṇanti ekūnavīsatibhedaṃ
atk-s0516a:465_0: Upādānakkhandhāti upādānagocarā khandhā upādānakkhandhā, majjhe padalopo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0516a:465_1: Upādānasambhūtā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā yathā tiṇaggi, thusaggi. Upādānavidheyyā
atk-s0516a:465_2: vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā yathā rājapuriso. Upādānappabhavā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā
atk-s0516a:465_3: yathā puppharukkho, phalarukkho. Upādānāni pana kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ
atk-s0516a:465_4: attavādupādānanti cattāri. Atthato pana bhusaṃ ādānanti upādānaṃ. Rūpupādānakkhandho,
atk-s0516a:465_6: pañca. Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānīti cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0516a:465_7: kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ. Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttanayā eva. Tathā aṭṭha lokadhammā.
atk-s0516a:465_8: Api ca – lābho, alābho, yaso, ayaso, nindā, pasaṃsā, sukhaṃ, dukkhanti ime aṭṭha
atk-s0516a:465_9: lokappavattiyā sati anuparivattanadhammakattā lokassa dhammāti lokadhammā. Etehi
atk-s0516a:465_10: mutto satto nāma natthi, buddhānampi hontiyeva. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:466_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā lokaṃ anuparivattanti, loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
atk-s0516a:466_1: Katame aṭṭha? Lābho ca alābho ca…pe… sukhañca dukkhañca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha
atk-s0516a:466_2: lokadhammā lokaṃ anuparivattanti, loko ca ime aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatī”ti.
atk-s0516a:467_0: Tattha anuparivattantīti anubandhanti nappajahanti, lokato na nivattantīti attho.
atk-s0516a:467_1: Lābhoti pabbajitassa cīvarādi, gahaṭṭhassa dhanadhaññādilābho. Soyeva alabbhamāno
atk-s0516a:467_2: lābho alābho na lābho alābhoti vuccati, no ca attābhāvappattito pariññeyyo siyā.
atk-s0516a:467_3: Yasoti parivāro. Soyeva alabbhamāno yaso ayaso. Nindāti avaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. Pasaṃsāti
atk-s0516a:467_5: kāyikacetasikaṃ, anāgāmiarahantānaṃ kāyikameva. Sattāvāsāti sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti
atk-s0516a:467_6: attho. Tāni pana tathā pakāsitā khandhā eva. Sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu asaññasattena
atk-s0516a:467_7: ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanena ca saddhiṃ nava sattāvāsā. Dasāyatanānīti cakkhāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0516a:467_8: rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0516a:467_9: rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatananti evaṃ dasa. Dvādasāyatanānīti manāyatanadhammāyatanehi
atk-s0516a:467_10: saddhiṃ evaṃ dvādasa. Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe…
atk-s0516a:467_11: manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātūti ekekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi katvā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0516a:468: Sadisanāmoti tesaṃ sadisanāmo ekaguṇavaṇṇanāmo. Sadisavhayoti ekaguṇavaṇṇanāmena avhāyano. Saccasadisavhayoti avitathaekaguṇavaṇṇanāmena aviparītena avhāyano.
atk-s0516a:469: Āsitoti upasaṅkamito. Upāsitoti upagantvā sevito. Payirupāsitoti bhattivasena atīva sevito.
atk-s0516a:470_1: āgamma vaseyya. Appadasseti bāvarippabhutike parittapaññe. Mahodadhinti anotattādiṃ
atk-s0516a:471_0: Appadassāti mandadassino. Parittadassāti atimandadassino. Thokadassāti parittatopi
atk-s0516a:471_2: Chatukkadassāti na uttamadassino. Appamāṇadassanti pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā appamāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:471_3: nibbānadassaṃ. Aggadassanti “aggato ve pasannāna”ntiādinā nayena aggadhammadassaṃ.
atk-s0516a:471_4: Seṭṭhadassanti sambuddho dvipadaseṭṭhoti seṭṭhadassaṃ. Viseṭṭhadassantiādīni cattāri
atk-s0516a:471_5: upasaggena vaḍḍhitāni. Asamanti na samaṃ asamaṃ sabbaññuṃ. Asamasamanti asamehi atītabuddhehi
atk-s0516a:471_6: samaṃ asamasamaṃ. Appaṭisamanti attano sadisavirahitaṃ. Appaṭibhāganti attano paṭibimbavirahitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:471_8: Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhena usabhaṃ. Achambhitaṭṭhena purisasīhaṃ. Niddosaṭṭhena purisanāgaṃ.
atk-s0516a:471_9: Uttamaṭṭhena purisājaññaṃ. Aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena
atk-s0516a:471_10: paccāmittena akampiye acalaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanaṭṭhena purisanisabhaṃ. Dhammadesanādhuravahanaṭṭhena purisadhorayhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:472_0: Mānasakaṃ vā saranti manasā cintetvā kataṃ pallaṃ vā nāmameva vā. Anotattaṃ vā dahanti
atk-s0516a:472_1: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena taṃ obhāsenti, ujuṃ
atk-s0516a:472_2: gacchantā na obhāsenti, tenevassa “anotatta”nti saṅkhā udapādi. Evarūpaṃ anotattaṃ
atk-s0516a:472_3: vā dahaṃ. Akkhobhaṃ amitodakanti cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aparimitaṃ udakajalarāsiṃ.
atk-s0516a:472_4: Evamevāti opammasaṃsandanaṃ, buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ akkhobhaṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṭṭhānena
atk-s0516a:472_5: cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Amitatejanti aparimitañāṇatejaṃ. Pabhinnañāṇanti dasabalañāṇādivasena
atk-s0516a:473_0: Paññāpabhedakusalanti “yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo”tiādinā nayena paññāya pabhedajānane
atk-s0516a:473_2: “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādinā nayena vuttesu
atk-s0516a:473_3: catūsu ṭhānesu visāradabhāvappattaṃ. Saddhādhimuttanti parisuddhe phalasamāpatticitte
atk-s0516a:473_4: adhimuttaṃ, tattha paviṭṭhaṃ. Setapaccattanti vāsanāya vippahīnattā parisuddhaṃ āveṇikaattabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0516a:473_5: Advayabhāṇinti paricchinnavacanattā dvivacanavirahitaṃ. Tādinti tādisaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
atk-s0516a:473_6: akampanaṃ vā. Tathā paṭiññā assāti tathāpaṭiñño, taṃ. Aparittanti na khuddakaṃ. Mahantanti
atk-s0516a:474_0: Gambhīranti aññesaṃ duppavesaṃ. Appameyyanti atulaṭṭhena appameyyaṃ. Duppariyogāhanti
atk-s0516a:474_1: pariyogāhituṃ dukkhappavesaṃ. Pahūtaratananti saddhādiratanehi pahūtaratanaṃ. Sāgarasamanti
atk-s0516a:474_2: ratanākarato samuddasadisaṃ. Chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgatanti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā
atk-s0516a:474_3: neva sumano hoti na dummano”ti vuttanayena chaḷaṅgupekkhāya paripuṇṇaṃ. Atulanti
atk-s0516a:474_4: tulavirahitaṃ, tulayituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Vipulanti atimahantaṃ. Appameyyanti pametuṃ
atk-s0516a:474_5: asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Taṃ tādisanti taṃ bhagavantaṃ tādiguṇasampannaṃ. Pavadataṃ maggavādinanti
atk-s0516a:474_6: pavadantānaṃ kathentānaṃ uttamaṃ kathayantaṃ vadantaṃ adhigacchinti sambandho. Merumiva
atk-s0516a:474_7: nagānanti pabbatānaṃ antare sineruṃ viya. Garuḷamiva dijānanti pakkhijātānaṃ antare
atk-s0516a:474_8: supaṇṇaṃ viya. Sīhamiva migānanti catuppadānamantare sīhaṃ viya. Udadhimiva aṇṇavānanti
atk-s0516a:474_9: vitthiṇṇaaṇṇavānaṃ antare samuddaṃ viya adhigacchiṃ. Jinapavaranti buddhuttamaṃ.
atk-s0516a:476: 107. Tamonudāsīnoti tamonudo āsīno. Bhūripaññāṇoti ñāṇaddhajo. Bhūrimedhasoti vipulapañño.
atk-s0516a:477_0: Niddese pabhaṅkaroti tejaṃkaro. Ālokakaroti anandhakārakaro. Obhāsakaroti obhāsaṃ
atk-s0516a:477_1: jotiṃ karotīti obhāsakaro. Dīpasadisaṃ ālokaṃ karotīti dīpaṅkaro. Padīpasadisaṃ ālokaṃ
atk-s0516a:477_2: karotīti padīpakaro. Ujjotakaroti patāpakaro. Pajjotakaroti disāvidisā patāpakaro.
atk-s0516a:478_0: Bhūripaññāṇoti puthulañāṇo. Ñāṇapaññāṇoti ñāṇena pākaṭo. Paññādhajoti ussitaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:478_1: paññāva dhajo assāti paññādhajo, dhajo rathassa paññāṇantiādīsu viya. Vibhūtavihārīti pākaṭavihāro.
atk-s0516a:479: 108. Sandiṭṭhikamakālikanti sāmaṃ passitabbaṃ phalaṃ, na ca kālantare pattabbaphalaṃ. Anītikanti kilesādiītivirahitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:480_0: Sandiṭṭhikanti lokuttaradhammo yena adhigato hoti, tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ
atk-s0516a:480_1: hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko, taṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ. Attano
atk-s0516a:480_2: phalaṃdānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo, akāloyeva akāliko. Yo ettha ariyamaggadhammo,
atk-s0516a:480_3: so attano samanantarameva phalaṃ detīti attho, taṃ akālikaṃ. Ehi passa imaṃ dhammanti
atk-s0516a:480_4: evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko, taṃ ehipassikaṃ. Ādittaṃ celaṃ
atk-s0516a:480_5: vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi attano citte upanayaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko, taṃ opaneyyikaṃ.
atk-s0516a:480_6: Sabbehipi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi “bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṃ phalaṃ, sacchikato nirodho”ti
atk-s0516a:480_7: attani attani veditabbanti paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhi.
atk-s0516a:481: 109. Atha naṃ bāvarī āha “kiṃ nu tamhā”ti dve gāthā.
atk-s0516a:482: Muhuttampīti thokampi. Khaṇampīti na bahukampi. Layampīti manampi. Vayampīti koṭṭhāsampi. Addhampīti divasampi.
atk-s0516a:483_0: 111-113. Tato piṅgiyo bhagavato santikā avippavāsameva dīpento “nāhaṃ tamhā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0516a:483_1: Nāhaṃ yo me…pe… passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvāti taṃ buddhaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya manasā
atk-s0516a:483_2: passāmi. Namassamāno vivasemi rattinti namassamānova rattiṃ atināmemi.
atk-s0516a:484: 114. Tena teneva natoti yena yena disābhāgena buddho, tena tenevāhampi nato, tanninno tappoṇoti dasseti.
atk-s0516a:485_0: 115. Dubbalathāmakassāti appathāmakassa. Atha vā dubbalassa dutthāmakassa ca, balavīriyahīnassāpīti
atk-s0516a:485_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Teneva kāyo na paletīti teneva dubbalatthāmakattena kāyo na gacchati,
atk-s0516a:485_2: yena buddho, na tena gacchati. “Na paretī”tipi pāṭho, so evattho. Tatthāti buddhassa
atk-s0516a:485_3: santike. Saṅkappayantāyāti saṅkappagamanena. Tena yuttoti yena buddho, tena yutto
atk-s0516a:486_0: Yena buddhoti yena disābhāgena buddho upasaṅkamitabbo, tena disābhāgena na paleti.
atk-s0516a:486_1: Atha vā bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Yattha buddho tattha na paleti na gacchati. Na
atk-s0516a:486_2: vajatīti purato na yāti. Na gacchatīti nivattati. Nātikkamatīti na upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0516a:487_0: 116. Paṅke sayānoti kāmakaddame sayamāno. Dīpā dīpaṃ upallavinti satthārādito satthārādiṃ
atk-s0516a:487_1: adhigacchiṃ. Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhanti sohaṃ evaṃ dudiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā anvāhiṇḍanto
atk-s0516a:488: Tattha semānoti nisajjamāno. Sayamānoti seyyaṃ kappayamāno. Āvasamānoti vasamāno. Parivasamānoti niccaṃ vasamāno.
atk-s0516a:489_0: Pallavinti uggamiṃ. Upallavinti uttariṃ, sampallavinti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:489_1: Addasanti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Addasanti passiṃ. Addakkhinti olokesiṃ. Apassinti
atk-s0516a:490_0: 117. Imissā gāthāya avasāne piṅgiyassa ca bāvarissa ca indriyaparipākaṃ viditvā bhagavā
atk-s0516a:490_1: sāvatthiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ muñci. Piṅgiyo bāvarissa buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayanto
atk-s0516a:490_2: nisinno eva taṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ ida”nti olokento bhagavantaṃ attano purato ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0516a:490_3: viya disvā bāvaribrāhmaṇassa “buddho āgato”ti ārocesi. Brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ
atk-s0516a:490_4: paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavāpi obhāsaṃ pharitvā brāhmaṇassa attānaṃ dassento ubhinnampi
atk-s0516a:490_5: sappāyaṃ viditvā piṅgiyameva ālapamāno “yathā ahū, vakkalī”ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0516a:491_0: Tassattho – yathā vakkalitthero saddhādhimutto ahosi, saddhādhureneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0516a:491_1: yathā ca soḷasannaṃ eko bhadrāvudho nāma, yathā ca āḷavigotamo ca. Evameva tvampi
atk-s0516a:491_2: pamuñcassu saddhaṃ, tato saddhāya adhimuccanto “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0516a:491_3: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā maccudheyyassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissasīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ
atk-s0516a:491_4: niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne piṅgiyo arahatte, bāvarī anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi, bāvaribrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0516a:492_0: Tattha muñcassūti mocassu. Pamuñcassūti mocehi. Adhimuñcassūti tattha adhimokkhaṃ
atk-s0516a:492_1: karassu. Okappehīti bahumānaṃ uppādehīti. Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena.
atk-s0516a:492_2: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti dukkhamaṭṭhena. Sabbe dhammā anattāti avasavattanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0516a:493: 118. Idāni piṅgiyo attano pasādaṃ nivedento “esa bhiyyotiādimāha. Tattha paṭibhānavāti paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāya upeto.
atk-s0516a:495_0: 119. Adhideve abhiññāyāti adhidevakare dhamme ñatvā. Paroparanti hīnapaṇītaṃ, attano
atk-s0516a:495_1: ca parassa ca adhidevattakaraṃ sabbadhammajātaṃ avedīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānatanti
atk-s0516a:496_0: Niddese pārāyanikapañhānanti pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṃ pucchānaṃ. Avasānaṃ karotīti antakaro.
atk-s0516a:496_1: Koṭiṃ karotīti pariyantakaro. Sīmaṃ mariyādaṃ karotīti paricchedakaro. Nigamaṃ karotīti
atk-s0516a:496_2: parivaṭumakaro. Sabhiyapañhānanti na kevalaṃ pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṃ pañhānaṃ eva,
atk-s0516a:496_3: atha kho sabhiyaparibbājakādīnampi pañhānaṃ antaṃ karotīti dassetuṃ “sabhiyapañhāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0516a:497_0: 120. Asaṃhīranti rāgādīhi asaṃhāriyaṃ. Asaṅkuppanti asaṅkuppaṃ avipariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0516a:497_1: Dvīhipi padehi nibbānaṃ bhaṇati. Addhā gamissāmīti ekaṃseneva taṃ anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ
atk-s0516a:497_2: gamissāmi. Na mettha kaṅkhāti natthi me ettha nibbāne kaṅkhā. Evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacittanti
atk-s0516a:497_3: piṅgiyo “evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddha”nti iminā bhagavato ovādena attani saddhaṃ
atk-s0516a:497_4: uppādetvā saddhādhureneva ca vimuñcitvā taṃ saddhādhimuttiṃ pakāsento bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0516a:497_5: āha – “evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta”nti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo “yathā maṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0516a:498_0: Na saṃhariyatīti gahetvā saṃharituṃ na sakkā. Niyogavacananti yuttavacanaṃ. Avatthāpanavacananti
atk-s0516a:498_1: sanniṭṭhānavacanaṃ. Imasmiṃ pārāyanavagge yaṃ antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0516a:505_0: 121. Ito paraṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesavaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. Tattha “sabbesu
atk-s0516a:505_1: bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa”nti ito paraṃ atirekapadamattameva vaṇṇayissāma. Tattha sabbesūti
atk-s0516a:505_2: anavasesesu. Bhūtesūti sattesu. Ettha bhūtesūti kiñcāpi bhūtasaddo “bhūtasmiṃ pācittiya”nti
atk-s0516a:505_3: evamādīsu vijjamāne, “bhūtamidaṃ, sāriputta, samanupassasī”ti evamādīsu khandhapañcake,
atk-s0516a:505_4: “cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetū”ti evamādīsu catubbidhe pathavīdhātvādirūpe,
atk-s0516a:505_5: “yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti evamādīsu khīṇāsave, “sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke
atk-s0516a:505_7: “bhūtaṃ bhūtato pajānātī”ti evamādīsu cātumahārājikānaṃ heṭṭhā sattanikāyaṃ upādāya
atk-s0516a:505_8: vattati. Idha pana avisesato pathavīpabbatādīsu jātā sattā bhūtāti veditabbā. Tesu
atk-s0516a:506_1: daṇḍayatīti daṇḍo, bādheti anayabyasanaṃ pāpetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vacīduccaritañca
atk-s0516a:506_2: manoduccaritañca. Paharaṇadaṇḍo eva vā daṇḍo, taṃ nidhāyātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Aviheṭhayanti
atk-s0516a:506_3: aviheṭhayanto. Aññatarampīti yaṃ kiñci ekampi. Tesampīti tesaṃ sabbabhūtānaṃ. Na
atk-s0516a:506_4: puttamiccheyyāti atrajo khettajo dinnako antevāsikoti imesu catūsu puttesu yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0516a:506_5: puttaṃ na iccheyya. Kuto sahāyanti sahāyaṃ pana iccheyyāti kuto eva etaṃ.
atk-s0516a:507_0: Ekoti pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāpahānaṭṭhena eko, ekantavigatakilesoti
atk-s0516a:507_1: eko, eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko. Samaṇasahassassapi hi majjhe vattamāno
atk-s0516a:507_2: gihisaññojanassa chinnattā eko, evaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko. Eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati,
atk-s0516a:507_3: eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko iriyati vattatīti eko. Evaṃ adutiyaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0516a:512_0: Evaṃ taṇhāpahānaṭṭhena eko. Sabbakilesāssa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā
atk-s0516a:512_1: āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti evaṃ ekantavigatakilesoti eko. Anācariyako hutvā sayambhū
atk-s0516a:512_2: sāmaññeva paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti evaṃ eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
atk-s0516a:513_0: Careti yā imā aṭṭha cariyāyo. Seyyathidaṃ – yā paṇidhisampannānaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0516a:513_1: iriyāpathacariyā, indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ ajjhattikāyatanesu āyatanacariyā, appamādavihārīnaṃ
atk-s0516a:513_2: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saticariyā, adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ catūsu jhānesu samādhicariyā,
atk-s0516a:513_3: buddhisampannānaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu ñāṇacariyā, sammā paṭipannānaṃ catūsu ariyamaggesu
atk-s0516a:513_4: maggacariyā, adhigataphalānaṃ catūsu sāmaññaphalesu paṭipatticariyā, tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:513_5: sabbasattesu lokatthacariyā, tattha padesato paccekabuddhasāvakānanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:513_6: “cariyāti aṭṭha cariyāyo yā iriyāpathacariyā”ti vitthāro. Tāhi cariyāhi samannāgato
atk-s0516a:513_7: bhaveyyāti attho. Atha vā yā imā “adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena
atk-s0516a:513_8: carati, upaṭṭhahanto satiyā carati, avikkhitto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya
atk-s0516a:513_9: carati, vijānanto viññāṇena carati, evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti āyatanacariyāya
atk-s0516a:513_10: carati, evaṃ paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti visesacariyāya caratī”ti evaṃ aparāpi
atk-s0516a:513_11: aṭṭha cariyā vuttā. Tāhi samannāgato bhaveyyāti attho. Khaggavisāṇakappoti khaggavisāṇo
atk-s0516a:514_1: Tathā hissa “okappanīyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa. Yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0516a:514_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanattho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
atk-s0516a:514_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0516a:514_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0516a:514_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
atk-s0516a:514_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo. “Satthukappena
atk-s0516a:514_7: vata kira, bho, sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”ti evamādīsu sadiso, paṭibhāgoti
atk-s0516a:514_8: attho. Idha panassa sadiso paṭibhāgoti attho veditabbo, khaggavisāṇasadisoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:515_0: Adhippāyānusandhito pana evaṃ veditabbo – yvāyaṃ vuttappakāro daṇḍo bhūtesu pavattiyamāno
atk-s0516a:515_1: ahito hoti, taṃ tesu appavattiyamānesu tappaṭipakkhabhūtāya mettāya hitūpasaṃhārena
atk-s0516a:515_2: ca sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, nihitadaṇḍattā eva ca yathā anihitadaṇḍā sattā
atk-s0516a:515_3: bhūtāni daṇḍena vā satthena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā viheṭhenti, tathā aviheṭhayaṃ,
atk-s0516a:515_4: aññatarampi tesaṃ imaṃ mettākammaṭṭhānamāgamma yadeva tattha vedanāgataṃ saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇagataṃ
atk-s0516a:515_5: tañca tadanusāreneva tadaññañca saṅkhāragataṃ vipassitvā imaṃ paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhī”ti
atk-s0516a:516_0: Ayaṃ pana anusandhi – evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “idāni, bhante, kuhiṃ gacchathā”ti?
atk-s0516a:516_1: Tato tena “pubbapaccekasambuddhā kattha vasantī”ti āvajjetvā ñatvā “gandhamādanapabbate”ti
atk-s0516a:516_2: vutte punāhaṃsu – “amhe dāni, bhante, pajahatha, na icchathā”ti. Atha paccekabuddho
atk-s0516a:516_3: āha – “na puttamiccheyyā”ti sabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – ahaṃ idāni atrajādīsu yaṃ
atk-s0516a:516_4: kiñci puttampi na iccheyyaṃ, kuto pana tumhādisaṃ sahāyaṃ. Tasmā tumhesupi yo mayā
atk-s0516a:516_5: saddhiṃ gantukāmo mādiso vā hotuṃ icchati, so eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. Atha vā
atk-s0516a:516_6: tehi “amhe dāni, bhante, pajahatha, na icchathā”ti vutte so paccekasambuddho “na
atk-s0516a:516_7: puttamiccheyya, kuto sahāya”nti vatvā attano yathāvuttenaṭṭhena ekacariyāya guṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:516_8: disvā pamudito pītisomanassajāto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0516a:517_0: Tattha tasāti vipāsakiriyā. Thāvarāti khīṇāsavā. Bhayabheravāti khuddānukhuddakā
atk-s0516a:517_1: cittutrāsā. Nidhāyāti chaḍḍetvā. Nidahitvāti ṭhapetvā. Oropayitvāti adhokaritvā.
atk-s0516a:517_2: Samoropayitvāti adhogataṃ vissajjetvā. Nikkhipitvāti tato apanetvā. Paṭippassambhitvāti sannisīdāpetvā.
atk-s0516a:518: Ālapananti ādito lapanaṃ. Sallapananti sammā lapanaṃ. Ullapananti uddhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ. Samullapananti punappunaṃ uddhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:519_0: Iriyāpathacariyāti iriyāpathānaṃ cariyā, pavattananti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0516a:519_1: Āyatanacariyā pana āyatanesu satisampajaññānaṃ cariyā. Pattīti phalāni. Tāni hi pāpuṇīyantīti
atk-s0516a:519_2: “pattī”ti vuttāni. Sattalokassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā atthā lokatthāti ayaṃ viseso.
atk-s0516a:520_0: Idāni tāsaṃ cariyānaṃ bhūmiṃ dassento “catūsu iriyāpathesū”tiādimāha. Satipaṭṭhānesūti
atk-s0516a:520_1: ārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānesupi vuccamānesu satito anaññāni, vohāravasena pana aññāni viya
atk-s0516a:520_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Ariyasaccesūti pubbabhāge lokiyasaccañāṇena visuṃ visuṃ saccapariggahavasena
atk-s0516a:520_3: vuttaṃ. Ariyamaggesu sāmaññaphalesūti ca vohāravaseneva vuttaṃ. Padesatoti lokatthacariyāya
atk-s0516a:520_4: ekadese. Nippadesato hi lokatthacariyaṃ buddhā eva karonti. Puna tā eva cariyāyo
atk-s0516a:520_6: nāma iriyāpathānaṃ santattā iriyāpathāva ṭhitiyā sampannā akampitairiyāpathā bhikkhubhāvānurūpena
atk-s0516a:521_0: Indriyesu guttadvārānanti cakkhādīsu chasu indriyesu attano attano visaye pavattaṃ
atk-s0516a:521_1: ekekadvāravasena guttaṃ dvāraṃ etesanti guttadvārā, tesaṃ guttadvārānaṃ. Dvāranti
atk-s0516a:521_2: cettha uppattidvāravasena cakkhādayo eva. Appamādavihārīnanti sīlādīsu appamādavihāravataṃ.
atk-s0516a:521_3: Adhicittamanuyuttānanti vipassanāya pādakabhāvena adhicittasaṅkhātaṃ samādhiṃ anuyuttānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:521_4: Buddhisampannānanti nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva gotrabhu, tāva pavattena
atk-s0516a:521_5: ñāṇena sampannānaṃ. Sammā paṭipannānanti catumaggakkhaṇe. Adhigataphalānanti catuphalakkhaṇe.
atk-s0516a:521_6: Tathāgatānanti tathā āgatānaṃ. Arahantānanti dūrakilesānaṃ. Sammāsambuddhānanti sammā
atk-s0516a:521_7: sāmañca sabbadhammabuddhānaṃ. Imesaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā pakāsito eva.
atk-s0516a:522_0: Padesato paccekabuddhānanti paccekasambuddhānaṃ ekadesato. Sāvakānanti sāvakānampi
atk-s0516a:522_1: ekadesato. Adhimuccantoti adhimokkhaṃ karonto. Saddhāya caratīti saddhāvasena pavattati.
atk-s0516a:522_2: Paggaṇhantoti catusammappadhānavīriyena padahanto. Upaṭṭhapentoti satiyā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:522_3: upaṭṭhapento. Avikkhepaṃ karontoti samādhivasena vikkhepaṃ akaronto. Pajānantoti
atk-s0516a:522_6: Evaṃ paṭipannassāti sahāvajjanāya indriyacariyāya paṭipannassa. Kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti
atk-s0516a:522_7: samathavipassanāvasena pavattā kusalā dhammā bhusaṃ yāpenti, pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0516a:522_8: Āyatanacariyāyāti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhusaṃ yatanacariyāya, pavattanacariyāyāti
atk-s0516a:523_0: Dassanacariyā ca sammādiṭṭhiyātiādīsu sammā passati, sammā vā tāya passanti, pasaṭṭhā
atk-s0516a:523_1: sundarā vā diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi, tassā sammādiṭṭhiyā nibbānapaccakkhakaraṇena dassanacariyā.
atk-s0516a:523_2: Sammā saṅkappeti, sammā vā tena saṅkappenti, pasaṭṭho sundaro vā saṅkappoti sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-s0516a:523_3: Tassa ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanacariyā. Sammā vadati, sammā vā tāya vadanti,
atk-s0516a:523_4: pasaṭṭhā sundarā vā vācāti sammāvācā, micchāvācāviratiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassā catubbidhavacīsaṃvarapariggahacariyā.
atk-s0516a:523_5: Sammā karoti, sammā vā tena karonti, pasaṭṭhaṃ sundaraṃ vā kammanti sammākammaṃ,
atk-s0516a:523_6: sammākammameva sammākammanto, micchākammantaviratiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassa tividhakāyasaṃvarasamuṭṭhānacariyā.
atk-s0516a:523_7: Sammā ājīvati, sammā vā tena ājīvanti, pasaṭṭho sundaro vā ājīvoti sammāājīvo, micchāājīvaviratiyā
atk-s0516a:523_8: etaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassa vodānacariyā parisuddhacariyā. Sammā vāyamati, sammā vā tena vāyamanti,
atk-s0516a:523_9: pasaṭṭho sundaro vā vāyāmoti sammāvāyāmo, tassa paggahacariyā. Sammā sarati, sammā
atk-s0516a:523_10: vā tāya saranti, pasaṭṭhā sundarā vā satīti sammāsati, tassā upaṭṭhānacariyā. Sammā
atk-s0516a:523_11: samādhiyati, sammā vā tena samādhiyanti, pasaṭṭho sundaro vā samādhīti sammāsamādhi,
atk-s0516a:524_0: Takkappoti tena kappo, evarūpoti attho. Tassadisoti tena sadiso, “tassadiko”ti vā
atk-s0516a:524_1: pāṭho. Tappaṭibhāgoti tena paṭibhāgo tappaṭibhāgo, edisoti attho. Sādurasaṃ atikkantaṃ
atk-s0516a:524_2: loṇaṃ atiloṇaṃ. Loṇakappoti loṇasadisoti vuccati. Atitittakanti atikkantatittakaṃ,
atk-s0516a:524_3: pucimandādikappo tittakasadisoti vuccati. Atimadhuranti khīrapāyāsādikaṃ. Himakappoti
atk-s0516a:524_4: himodakasadiso. Satthukappoti satthunā buddhena sadiso. Evamevāti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:525_0: Tatrāyaṃ etassa paccekabuddhassa saṅkhepena vipassanāācikkhanavidhiṃ dassetvā gamissāma.
atk-s0516a:525_1: Tattha nāmarūpapariggahaṃ kātukāmo paccekabodhisatto rūpārūpaaṭṭhasamāpattīsu yaṃ
atk-s0516a:525_2: kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni ca taṃsampayutte ca phassādayo
atk-s0516a:525_4: namanato namanaṭṭhena nāma”nti vavatthapeti. Tato tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto “hadayavatthuṃ
atk-s0516a:525_5: nissāya pavattatī”ti passati. Puna vatthussa paccayabhūtāni ca upādārūpāni ca passitvā
atk-s0516a:525_6: “idaṃ sabbaṃ ruppanato rūpa”nti pariggaṇhāti. Puna tadubhayaṃ “namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ,
atk-s0516a:525_7: ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpa”nti evaṃ saṅkhepato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti. Samathayānikavasenetaṃ
atk-s0516a:525_8: vuttaṃ. Vipassanāyāniko pana catudhātuvavatthānamukhena bhūtupādāyarūpāni paricchinditvā
atk-s0516a:525_9: “sabbampetaṃ ruppanato rūpa”nti passati. Tato evaṃ paricchinnarūpassa cakkhādīni
atk-s0516a:525_10: nissāya pavattamānā arūpadhammā āpāthamāgacchanti. Tato sabbepi te arūpadhamme namanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0516a:525_11: ekato katvā “idaṃ nāma”nti passati, so “idaṃ nāmaṃ, idaṃ rūpa”nti dvedhā vavatthapeti.
atk-s0516a:525_12: Evaṃ vavatthapetvā “nāmarūpato uddhaṃ añño satto vā puggalo vā devo vā brahmā vā natthī”ti passati.
atk-s0516a:526: Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
atk-s0516a:528_0: Evameva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu santesu “satto puggalo”ti vohāramattaṃ hotīti evamādinā
atk-s0516a:528_1: nayena nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassanasaṅkhātena diṭṭhivisuddhibhūtena ñāṇena nāmarūpaṃ
atk-s0516a:528_2: pariggahetvā puna tassa paccayampi pariggaṇhanto vuttanayena nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0516a:528_3: “ko nu kho imassa hetū”ti pariyesanto ahetuvādavisamahetuvādesu dosaṃ disvā rogaṃ
atk-s0516a:528_4: disvā tassa nidānaṃ samuṭṭhānampi pariyesanto vejjo viya tassa hetuñca paccayañca
atk-s0516a:528_5: pariyesanto avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kammanti ime cattāro dhamme nāmarūpassa uppādapaccayattā
atk-s0516a:528_6: “hetū”ti. Āhāraṃ upatthambhanapaccayattā “paccayo”ti ca passati. Imassa hi kāyassa
atk-s0516a:528_7: avijjādayo tayo dhammā mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā honti, kammaṃ pitā viya puttassa
atk-s0516a:528_8: janakaṃ, āhāro dhāti viya dārakassa sandhārakoti. Evaṃ rūpakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ
atk-s0516a:528_9: katvā puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena nāmakāyassapi
atk-s0516a:528_10: paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto “atītānāgatāpi dhammā evameva vattantī”ti
atk-s0516a:529_0: Tassa yā sā pubbantaṃ ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ,
atk-s0516a:529_1: kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā.
atk-s0516a:530_0: Yāpi aparantaṃ ārabbha “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho bhavissāmi,
atk-s0516a:530_1: kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho
atk-s0516a:531_0: Yāpi etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃkathī hoti “ahaṃ nu khosmi,
atk-s0516a:531_1: no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ
atk-s0516a:531_2: gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā vicikicchā vuttā, sā sabbāpi pahiyyati. Evaṃ paccayapariggahaṇena
atk-s0516a:531_3: tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ “kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhī”tipi “dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”ntipi
atk-s0516a:532_0: Ettha pana tisso hi lokiyapariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti. Tattha
atk-s0516a:532_1: “ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0516a:532_2: pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma. “Rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, vedanā aniccā”tiādinā pana nayena
atk-s0516a:532_3: tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāpaññā
atk-s0516a:532_4: tīraṇapariññā nāma. Tesu eva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāva
atk-s0516a:533_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiñhi
atk-s0516a:533_1: antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Kalāpasammasanato
atk-s0516a:533_2: paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiñhi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva
atk-s0516a:533_3: ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi. Tato ca
atk-s0516a:533_4: paṭṭhāya hi aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ,
atk-s0516a:533_5: anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ, nibbindanto nandiṃ, virajjanto rāgaṃ, nirodhento
atk-s0516a:533_6: samudayaṃ, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatīti evaṃ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ
atk-s0516a:533_7: anupassanānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ. Iti imāsu tīsu pariññāsu saṅkhāraparicchedassa ceva paccayapariggahassa
atk-s0516a:533_8: ca sādhitattā iminā yoginā ñātapariññāva adhigatā.
atk-s0516a:534_0: Puna “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā…pe… yaṃ dūre
atk-s0516a:534_1: santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ hutvā abhāvato aniccaṃ, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0516a:534_2: avasavattittā anattā. Yā kāci vedanā… saññā… ye keci saṅkhārā … yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:534_3: atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā
atk-s0516a:534_4: paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ hutvā abhāvato aniccaṃ, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā
atk-s0516a:534_5: dukkhaṃ, avasavattittā anattā”ti evamādinā nayena kalāpasammasanaṃ karoti. Idaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0516a:535_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāre aniccadukkhānattavasena kalāpasammasanaṃ katvā puna saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayameva
atk-s0516a:535_2: Evaṃ rūpakkhandhassa paccayāyattatādassanena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:535_3: passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Evaṃ pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ
atk-s0516a:535_5: rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ
atk-s0516a:535_6: passatīti evaṃ pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
atk-s0516a:536_1: paccayāyattatādassanena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi
atk-s0516a:536_3: vedanānirodho”ti paccayanirodhadassanena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:536_4: passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Evaṃ saññākkhandhādīsupi.
atk-s0516a:537_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – viññāṇakkhandhassa phassaṭṭhāne “nāmarūpasamudayā, nāmarūpanirodhā”ti
atk-s0516a:537_1: yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekekasmiṃ khandhe paccayasamudayavasena ca nibbattilakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0516a:537_2: ca paccayanirodhavasena ca vipariṇāmalakkhaṇavasena ca udayabbayadassanena ca dasa
atk-s0516a:537_3: dasa katvā paññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni. Tesaṃ vasena “evampi rūpassa udayo, evampi
atk-s0516a:537_4: rūpassa vayo”ti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena manasikāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0516a:538_0: Tassevaṃ karoto “iti kira ime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī”ti ñāṇaṃ visadaṃ
atk-s0516a:538_1: hoti. “Evaṃ kira ime dhammā anuppannā uppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavā
atk-s0516a:538_2: hutvā saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Na kevalañca niccanavā, sūriyuggamane ussāvabindu viya
atk-s0516a:538_3: udakabubbuḷo viya udake daṇḍarāji viya āragge sāsapo viya vijjuppādo viya ca parittaṭṭhāyino,
atk-s0516a:538_5: hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Ettāvatā ca pana anena “vayadhammameva uppajjati, uppannañca
atk-s0516a:538_6: vayaṃ upetī”ti iminā ākārena sammasanapaññāya lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ
atk-s0516a:538_7: nāma paṭhamaṃ taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti. Yassādhigamā “āraddhavipassako”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0516a:539_0: Athassa āraddhavipassakassa kulaputtassa obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho
atk-s0516a:539_1: paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikantīti dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjanti. Ettha obhāso
atk-s0516a:539_2: nāma vipassanakkhaṇe ñāṇassa balavattā lohitaṃ sannisīdati, tena ca cittobhāso nibbattati.
atk-s0516a:539_3: Taṃ disvā akusalo yogī “maggo me patto”ti tameva obhāsaṃ assādeti. Ñāṇampi vipassanāñāṇameva.
atk-s0516a:539_4: Taṃ saṅkhāre sammasantassa suddhaṃ pasannaṃ hutvā pavattati. Taṃ disvā pubbe viya
