atk-s0516a:539_5: “maggo”ti assādeti. Pītipi vipassanāpīti eva. Tassa hi tasmiṃ khaṇe pañcavidhā pīti
atk-s0516a:539_6: uppajjati. Passaddhīti vipassanāpassaddhi. Tasmiṃ samaye neva kāyacittānaṃ daratho,
atk-s0516a:539_7: na gāravaṃ, na kakkhaḷatā, na akammaññatā, na gelaññatā, na vaṅkatā hoti. Sukhampi
atk-s0516a:539_8: vipassanāsukhameva. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:540_0: Adhimokkho nāma vipassanakkhaṇe pavattā saddhā. Tasmiñhi khaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ ativiya
atk-s0516a:540_1: pasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati. Paggaho nāma vipassanāsampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ.
atk-s0516a:540_2: Tasmiñhi khaṇe asithilaṃ anaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati. Upaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0516a:540_3: vipassanāsampayuttā sati. Tasmiñhi khaṇe supaṭṭhitā sati uppajjati. Upekkhā duvidhā
atk-s0516a:540_4: vipassanāvajjanavasena. Tasmiñhi khaṇe sabbasaṅkhāragahaṇe majjhattabhūtaṃ vipassanupekkhāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0516a:540_5: ñāṇaṃ balavantaṃ hutvā uppajjati manodvārāvajjanupekkhā ca. Sā ca taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:540_6: āvajjantassa sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati. Nikantīti vipassanānikanti. Obhāsādīsu hi
atk-s0516a:540_7: ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati. Ettha obhāsādayo kilesavatthutāya
atk-s0516a:540_8: “upakkilesā”ti vuttā na akusalattā. Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva kilesavatthu ca.
atk-s0516a:541_0: Paṇḍito pana bhikkhu obhāsādīsu uppannesu vikkhepaṃ agacchanto “obhāsādayo dhammā
atk-s0516a:541_1: na maggo, upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti maggañca
atk-s0516a:541_2: amaggañca vavatthapeti. Tassevaṃ “ayaṃ maggo, ayaṃ na maggo”ti ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:541_3: maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuccati. Ito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ
atk-s0516a:541_4: vasena sikhāpattavipassanāñāṇaṃ navamañca saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti ayaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi
atk-s0516a:541_5: nāma hoti. Udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:541_7: imāni aṭṭha ñāṇāni nāma. Navamaṃ saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti anulomassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0516a:542_0: Tasmā taṃ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ ādiṃkatvā etesu ñāṇesu
atk-s0516a:542_1: yogo karaṇīyo. Udayabbayaṃ passantassa hi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0516a:542_2: udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṃ passato dukkhalakkhaṇañca, “dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0516a:543_0: Ettha ca aniccaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ anattā anattalakkhaṇanti
atk-s0516a:543_1: ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā,
atk-s0516a:543_2: hutvā abhāvato vā. Aññathattaṃ nāma jarā. Uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, hutvā
atk-s0516a:543_3: abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro. “Yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0516a:543_4: dukkhaṃ. Kasmā? Abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷanato. Abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷanākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ. “Yaṃ
atk-s0516a:543_5: dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato.
atk-s0516a:543_6: Avasavattanākāro anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Imāni tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni udayabbayaṃ passantasseva ārammaṇāni honti.
atk-s0516a:544_0: Punapi so rūpārūpadhamme “evaṃ aniccā”tiādinā vipassati, tassa saṅkhārā lahuṃ lahuṃ
atk-s0516a:544_1: āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, tato uppādaṃ vā ṭhitiṃ vā pavattaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ akatvā
atk-s0516a:544_2: tesaṃ khayavayanirodhe eva sati santiṭṭhati, idaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ nāma. Imassa uppādato
atk-s0516a:544_3: paṭṭhāya ayaṃ yogī “yathā ime saṅkhārā bhijjanti nirujjhanti, evaṃ atītepi saṅkhāragataṃ
atk-s0516a:544_4: bhijji, anāgatepi bhijjissatī”ti nirodhameva passanto tiṭṭhati. Tassa bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:544_5: āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayoni gatiṭṭhiti sattāvāsesu pabhedakā saṅkhārā
atk-s0516a:544_6: jalitaaṅgārakāsuādayo viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Etaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:545_0: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa sabbe bhavādayo ādittaaṅgāraṃ viya samussitakhaggo
atk-s0516a:545_1: viya paccatthiko appaṭisaraṇā sādīnavā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Idaṃ ādīnavānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:545_2: nāma. Tassa evaṃ saṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa bhavādīsupi saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavattā
atk-s0516a:545_3: saṅkhāresu ukkaṇṭhanā anabhirati uppajjati, idaṃ nibbidānupassanāñāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:546_0: Sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa tasmā saṅkhāragatā muñcitukāmatā nissaritukāmatā
atk-s0516a:546_1: hoti. Idaṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ nāma. Puna tasmā saṅkhāragatā muñcituṃ pana te eva
atk-s0516a:546_2: saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tīraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:547_0: So evaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto tesu anattalakkhaṇassa sudiṭṭhattā
atk-s0516a:547_1: “attā”ti vā “attaniya”nti vā agaṇhanto saṅkhāresu bhayañca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāresu
atk-s0516a:547_2: udāsīno hoti majjhatto, “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā na gaṇhāti, tīsu bhavesu upekkhako,
atk-s0516a:548_0: Taṃ panesa ce santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati, sabbasaṅkhārapavattaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0516a:548_1: nibbānaninnaṃ pakkhandaṃ hoti. No ce nibbānaṃ santato passati, punappunaṃ “anicca”nti
atk-s0516a:548_2: vā “dukkha”nti vā “anattā”ti vā tividhānupassanāvasena saṅkhārārammaṇameva hutvā
atk-s0516a:548_3: pavattati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānañca etaṃ tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0516a:548_4: Tisso hi anupassanā “tīṇi vimokkhamukhānī”ti vuccanti. Evaṃ aniccato manasikaronto
atk-s0516a:548_5: adhimokkhabahulo animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati, dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo
atk-s0516a:548_6: appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati, anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññataṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0516a:549_0: Ettha ca animitto vimokkhoti animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo.
atk-s0516a:549_1: So hi animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto, kilesehi ca vimuttattā vimokkho. Eteneva
atk-s0516a:549_2: nayena appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihito, suññatākārena
atk-s0516a:549_3: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto suññatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:550_0: Evaṃ adhigatasaṅkhārupekkhassa kulaputtassa vipassanā sikhāppattā hoti. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti
atk-s0516a:550_1: etadeva. Assa taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa tikkhatarā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:550_2: Tassa “idāni maggo uppajjissatī”ti saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti
atk-s0516a:550_3: vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāya kathitanayeneva
atk-s0516a:550_4: aniccādiākārena manasikaritvā uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ, tatheva manasikaroto paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0516a:550_5: javanacittaṃ uppajjati. Yaṃ parikammanti vuccati, tadanantaraṃ tadeva dutiyajavanacittaṃ
atk-s0516a:550_6: uppajjati. Yaṃ upacāranti vuccati, tadanantarampi tadeva uppajjati tatiyaṃ javanacittaṃ.
atk-s0516a:550_7: Yaṃ anulomanti vuccati, idaṃ tesaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:551_1: vuccati. Idaṃ pana anulomañāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_2: hoti, nippariyāyena pana gotrabhuñāṇameva vipassanāya pariyosānanti vuccati. Tato
atk-s0516a:551_3: paraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ atikkamamānaṃ ariyagottaṃ okkamamānaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_5: Idaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiñca ñāṇadassanavisuddhiñca na bhajati.
atk-s0516a:551_7: vā “vipassanā”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā gotrabhuñāṇe niruddhe
atk-s0516a:551_8: tena dinnasaññāya nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_9: vicikicchāsaṃyojananti tīṇi saṃyojanāni viddhaṃsento sotāpattimaggo uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0516a:551_10: tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjanti anantaravipākattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:551_11: phalapariyosāne panassa uppannabhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā paccavekkhaṇatthāya manodvārāvajjanaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_12: uppajjati. So hi “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati. Tato “me ayaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_13: ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati. Tato “ime nāma kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese
atk-s0516a:551_14: paccavekkhati. Tato “ime nāma kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhakilese paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_15: Avasāne ca “ayaṃ dhammo mayā paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati. Iti sotāpannassa
atk-s0516a:551_16: ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti. Tathā sakadāgāmianāgāmiphalāvasāne. Arahattaphalāvasāne
atk-s0516a:551_17: avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ sabbānipi ekūnavīsatipaccavekkhaṇāni honti.
atk-s0516a:552_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā so yogāvacaro tasmiṃyeva āsane nisinno vuttanayena vipassitvā
atk-s0516a:552_1: kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvaṃ karonto dutiyamaggaṃ pāpuṇāti, tadanantaraṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0516a:552_2: phalañca. Tato vuttanayena vipassitvā kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānaṃ karonto
atk-s0516a:552_3: tatiyamaggaṃ pāpuṇāti, vuttanayena phalañca. Tato tasmiṃyevāsane vuttanayena vipassitvā
atk-s0516a:552_5: vuttanayena phalañca. Ettāvatā cesa hoti arahā mahākhīṇāsavo paccekabuddho. Iti imesu
atk-s0516a:553_0: Ettāvatā “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesa”nti etena pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlassa
atk-s0516a:553_1: vuttattā sīlavisuddhi. “Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāya”nti etena paṭighānunayavivajjanavasena
atk-s0516a:553_2: mettādīnaṃ vuttattā cittavisuddhi. “Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti iminā pana nāmarūpapariggahādīnaṃ
atk-s0516a:553_4: ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti satta visuddhiyo vuttā honti. Ayamettha mukhamattanidassanaṃ,
atk-s0516a:553_5: vitthāraṃ pana icchantena visuddhimaggaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ceso paccekabuddho –
atk-s0516a:555: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. –
atk-s0516a:556: Pasaṃsiyādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā gandhamādanapabbataṃ upasobhayamāno vihāsinti evaṃ sabbattha.
atk-s0516a:558_1: pañcavidho saṃsaggo. Tattha aññamaññaṃ disvā cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo
atk-s0516a:558_2: dassanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tattha sīhaḷadīpe kāḷadīghavāpīgāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ kalyāṇavihāravāsiṃ
atk-s0516a:558_3: daharabhikkhuṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā kenaci upāyena taṃ alabhitvā kālakatā kuṭumbiyadhītā
atk-s0516a:558_4: tassā nivāsanacoḷakkhaṇḍaṃ disvā “evarūpāya vatthadhāriniyā nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ
atk-s0516a:558_5: nālattha”nti hadayaṃ phāletvā kālakato so eva ca daharo nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:559_0: Parehi pana kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ sutvā sotaviññāṇavīthivasena
atk-s0516a:559_1: uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tatrāpi girigāmavāsīkammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi
atk-s0516a:559_2: saddhiṃ padumassaraṃ gantvā nhāyitvā mālaṃ sīse āropetvā uccāsaddena gāyantiyā ākāsena
atk-s0516a:559_3: gacchanto saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena jhānā parihāyitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsī
atk-s0516a:560_0: Aññamaññaṃ aṅgaparāmasanena uppannarāgo kāyasaṃsaggo nāma. Dhammagāyanadaharabhikkhu
atk-s0516a:560_1: cettha nidassanaṃ. Mahāvihāre kira daharabhikkhu dhammaṃ bhāsati, tattha mahājane
atk-s0516a:560_2: āgate rājāpi agamāsi saddhiṃ antepurena. Tato rājadhītāya tassa rūpañca saddañca
atk-s0516a:560_3: āgamma balavarāgo uppanno tassa ca daharassāpi. Taṃ disvā rājā sallakkhetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0516a:560_4: parikkhipāpesi, te aññamaññaṃ parāmasitvā āliṅgisu. Puna sāṇipākāraṃ apanetvā passantā
atk-s0516a:561_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālapanasamullapane uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Bhikkhubhikkhunīhi
atk-s0516a:561_1: saddhiṃ paribhogakaraṇe uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Dvīsupi ca etesu maricavaṭṭivihāre
atk-s0516a:561_2: bhikkhu ca bhikkhunī ca nidassanaṃ. Maricavaṭṭimahāvihāramahe kira duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayamahārājā
atk-s0516a:561_3: mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā ubhatosaṅghaṃ parivisati. Tattha uṇhayāguyā dinnāya saṅghanavakasāmaṇerī
atk-s0516a:561_4: anādhārakassa sattavassikasaṅghanavakasāmaṇerassa dantavalayaṃ datvā samullāpaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0516a:561_5: te ubhopi upasampajjitvā saṭṭhivassā hutvā paratīraṃ gatā aññamaññaṃ samullāpena
atk-s0516a:561_6: pubbasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tāvadeva jātasinehā sikkhāpadāni vītikkamitvā pārājikā ahesunti.
atk-s0516a:562_0: Evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yena kenaci saṃsaggena jātasaṃsaggassa bhavanti snehā, purimarāgapaccayā
atk-s0516a:562_1: balavarāgo uppajjati. Tato snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotīti tameva snehaṃ anugacchantaṃ
atk-s0516a:562_3: bhavati jāyati. Apare pana “ārammaṇe cittavosaggo saṃsaggo”ti bhaṇanti. Tato sneho snehadukkhanti.
atk-s0516a:563_0: Evamatthappabhedaṃ imaṃ aḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā so paccekabuddho āha – “svāhaṃ yamidaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_1: snehanvayaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ pahoti, tassa dukkhassa mūlaṃ khananto paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0516a:563_2: adhigato”ti. Evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “amhehi dāni, bhante, kiṃ kattabba”nti?
atk-s0516a:563_3: Tato so āha – “tumhe vā aññe vā yo imamhā dukkhā muccitukāmo, so sabbopi ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_4: snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti. Ettha ca yaṃ taṃ “snehanvayaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_5: dukkhamidaṃ pahotī”ti vuttaṃ, tadeva sandhāya “ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno”ti idaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_6: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā yathāvuttena saṃsaggena saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā,
atk-s0516a:563_7: snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti, evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno ahaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_8: adhigatoti evampi abhisambandhitvā catutthapādo pubbe vuttanayeneva udānavasena vuttoti
atk-s0516a:563_9: veditabbo. Tato paraṃ sabbaṃ purimagāthāya vuttasadisamevāti.
atk-s0516a:564_0: Niddese anuppādetīti rūpasmiṃ anubyañjanaṃ disvā allīyati. Anubandhatīti rūpasmiṃ
atk-s0516a:564_1: snehavasena bandhati. Bhavantīti honti. Jāyantīti uppajjanti. Nibbattantīti vattanti.
atk-s0516a:564_2: Pātubhavantīti pākaṭā honti. Sambhavanti sañjāyanti abhinibbattantīti tīṇi upasaggena
atk-s0516a:564_3: vaḍḍhitāni. Ito paraṃ aṭṭhakavagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:566_0: 123. Tatiye mettāyanavasena mittā. Suhadabhāvena suhajjā. Keci hi ekantahitakāmatāya
atk-s0516a:566_1: mittāva honti, na suhajjā. Keci gamanāgamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsamullāpādīsu hadayasukhajananena
atk-s0516a:566_2: suhajjāva honti, na mittā. Keci tadubhayavasena suhajjā ceva mittā ca. Te duvidhā
atk-s0516a:566_3: honti agāriyā ca anagāriyā ca. Tattha agāriyā tividhā honti upakārā samānasukhadukkhā
atk-s0516a:566_4: anukampakāti. Anagāriyā visesena atthakkhāyino. Evaṃ te catūhi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā honti.
atk-s0516a:568_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi upakāro mitto suhado veditabbo. Pamattaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0516a:568_1: pamattassa sāpateyyaṃ rakkhati, bhītassa saraṇaṃ hoti, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu
atk-s0516a:570_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi samānasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo. Guyhamassa
atk-s0516a:570_1: ācikkhati, guyhamassa parigūhati, āpadāsu na vijahati, jīvitampissa atthāya pariccattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:572: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo. Abhavenassa na nandati, bhavenassa nandati, avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ nivāreti, vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ pasaṃsati.
atk-s0516a:574: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi atthakkhāyī mitto suhado veditabbo. Pāpā nivāreti, kalyāṇe niveseti, assutaṃ sāveti, saggassa maggaṃ ācikkhatī”ti.
atk-s0516a:575: Tesu idha agāriyā adhippetā, atthato pana sabbepi yujjanti. Te mitte suhajje. Anukampamānoti anudayamāno, tesaṃ sukhaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo dukkhaṃ apaharitukāmo.
atk-s0516a:576_0: Hāpeti atthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena tividhaṃ, tathā attatthaparatthaubhayatthavasenāpi
atk-s0516a:576_1: tividhaṃ atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti. Paṭibaddhacittoti
atk-s0516a:576_2: “ahaṃ imaṃ vinā na jīvāmi, eso me gati, eso me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne
atk-s0516a:576_3: ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti. “Ime maṃ vinā na jīvanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ gati, ahaṃ
atk-s0516a:576_4: tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti. Idha
atk-s0516a:577_0: Etaṃ bhayanti etaṃ atthahāpanabhayaṃ, attano samāpattihāniṃ sandhāya bhaṇati. Santhaveti
atk-s0516a:577_1: tividho santhavo taṇhādiṭṭhimittasanthavavasena. Tattha aṭṭhasatappabhedāpi taṇhā
atk-s0516a:577_2: taṇhāsanthavo, dvāsaṭṭhippabhedāpi diṭṭhi diṭṭhisanthavo, paṭibaddhacittatāya mittānukampanā
atk-s0516a:577_3: mittasanthavo. So idha adhippeto. Tena hissa samāpatti parihīnā. Tenāha – “etaṃ bhayaṃ
atk-s0516a:577_4: santhave pekkhamāno”ti. Sesaṃ pubbasadisamevāti veditabbaṃ. Niddese vattabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0516a:579_0: 124. Catutthe vaṃsoti veḷu. Visāloti vitthiṇṇo. Va-kāro avadhāraṇattho, evakāro vā
atk-s0516a:579_1: ayaṃ. Sandhivasenettha e-kāro naṭṭho. Tassa parapadena sambandho, taṃ pacchā yojessāma.
atk-s0516a:579_2: Yathāti paṭibhāge. Visattoti laggo jaṭito saṃsibbito. Puttesu dāresu cāti puttadhītubhariyāsu.
atk-s0516a:579_3: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sneho. Vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamānoti vaṃsakaḷīro viya alaggamāno.
atk-s0516a:579_4: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti, puttesu ca dāresu ca yā apekkhā,
atk-s0516a:579_5: sāpi evaṃ tāni vatthūni saṃsibbitvā ṭhitattā visattā eva. Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya apekkhavā
atk-s0516a:579_6: visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ maggañāṇena
atk-s0516a:579_7: chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā diṭṭhādīsu vā lābhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu
atk-s0516a:579_8: vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena asajjamāno paccekasambodhiṃ adhigatoti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva
atk-s0516a:581_0: 125. Pañcame migoti sabbesaṃ āraññikacatuppadānaṃ eva etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana
atk-s0516a:581_1: pasadamigo adhippeto. Araññamhīti gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ araññaṃ,
atk-s0516a:581_2: idha pana uyyānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā “uyyānamhī”ti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāti paṭibhāge.
atk-s0516a:581_3: Abaddhoti rajjubandhanādīsu yena kenaci abaddho. Etena vissaṭṭhacariyaṃ dīpeti. Yenicchakaṃ
atk-s0516a:581_4: gacchati gocarāyāti yena disābhāgena gantuṃ icchati, tena gocaratthaṃ gacchati. Tasmā
atk-s0516a:581_5: tattha yattakaṃ icchati gantuṃ, tattakaṃ gacchati. Yaṃ icchati khādituṃ, taṃ khādatīti
atk-s0516a:581_6: dīpeti. Viññū naroti paṇḍitapuriso. Seritanti sacchandavuttitaṃ aparāyattabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0516a:581_7: Pekkhamānoti paññācakkhunā olokayamāno. Atha vā dhammaseritaṃ puggalaseritañca. Lokuttaradhammā
atk-s0516a:581_8: hi kilesavasaṃ agamanato serino tehi samannāgatā puggalā ca, tesaṃ bhāvaniddeso seritaṃ
atk-s0516a:581_9: pekkhamānoti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati
atk-s0516a:581_10: gocarāya. Kadā nu kho ahampi taṇhābandhanaṃ chinditvā evaṃ gaccheyyanti iti me tumhehi
atk-s0516a:581_11: ito cito ca parivāretvā ṭhitehi baddhassa yenicchakaṃ gantuṃ alabhantassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0516a:581_12: yenicchakagamanābhāve ādīnavaṃ yenicchakagamane ānisaṃsaṃ disvā anukkamena samathavipassanāpāripūriṃ
atk-s0516a:581_13: agamiṃ. Tato paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhi. Tasmā aññopi viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno,
atk-s0516a:583_0: 126. Chaṭṭhe ayaṃ piṇḍattho – sahāyamajjhe ṭhitassa divāseyyasaṅkhāte vāse ca mahāupaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte
atk-s0516a:583_1: ṭhāne ca uyyānagamanasaṅkhāte gamane ca janapadacārikasaṅkhātāya cārikāya ca “idaṃ
atk-s0516a:583_2: me suṇa, idaṃ me dehī”tiādinā nayena tathā tathā āmantanā hoti, tasmā ahaṃ tattha
atk-s0516a:583_3: tattha nibbijjitvā yāyaṃ ariyajanasevitā anekānisaṃsā ekantasukhā, evaṃ santepi lobhābhibhūtehi
atk-s0516a:583_4: sabbakāpurisehi anabhijjhitā apatthitā pabbajjā, taṃ anabhijjhitaṃ paresaṃ avasavattanena
atk-s0516a:583_5: bhabbapuggalavaseneva ca seritaṃ pekkhamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā anukkamena paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0516a:585_0: 127. Sattame khiḍḍāti kīḷanā. Sā duvidhā hoti kāyikā ca vācasikā ca. Tattha kāyikā
atk-s0516a:585_1: nāma hatthīhipi kīḷanti, assehipi rathehipi dhanūhipi tharūhipīti evamādi. Vācasikā
atk-s0516a:585_2: nāma gītaṃ silokabhaṇanaṃ mukhabherikanti evamādi. Ratīti pañcakāmaguṇarati. Vipulanti
atk-s0516a:585_3: yāva aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca ṭhānena sakalattabhāvabyāpakaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Anusandhiyojanāpi
atk-s0516a:587_0: 128. Aṭṭhame cātuddisoti catūsu disāsu yathāsukhavihārī, “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
atk-s0516a:587_1: vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāpharitā catasso disā assa santītipi cātuddiso. Tāsu
atk-s0516a:587_2: disāsu katthaci satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihaññatīti appaṭigho. Santussamānoti
atk-s0516a:587_3: dvādasavidhassa santosassa vasena santussako. Itarītarenāti uccāvacena paccayena.
atk-s0516a:587_4: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhīti ettha parissayanti kāyacittāni, parihāpenti vā tesaṃ
atk-s0516a:587_5: sampattiṃ, tāni vā paṭicca sayantīti parissayā, bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ abbhantarānañca
atk-s0516a:587_6: kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te parissaye adhivāsanakhantiyā
atk-s0516a:587_7: ca vīriyādīhi ca dhammehi sahatīti parissayānaṃ sahitā. Thaddhabhāvakarabhayābhāvena
atk-s0516a:587_8: achambhī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā te cattāro samaṇā, evaṃ itarītarena paccayena santussamāno
atk-s0516a:587_9: ettha paṭipattipadaṭṭhāne santose ṭhito catūsu disāsu mettādibhāvanāya cātuddiso,
atk-s0516a:587_10: sattasaṅkhāresu paṭihananakarabhayābhāvena appaṭigho ca hoti. So cātuddisattā vuttappakārānaṃ
atk-s0516a:587_11: parissayānaṃ sahitā, appaṭighattā achambhī ca hotīti etaṃ paṭipattiguṇaṃ disvā yoniso
atk-s0516a:588_0: Atha vā te samaṇā viya santussamāno itarītarena vuttanayeneva cātuddiso hotīti ñatvā
atk-s0516a:588_1: evaṃ cātuddisabhāvaṃ patthayanto yoniso paṭipajjitvā adhigatomhi. Tasmā aññopi īdisaṃ
atk-s0516a:588_2: ṭhānaṃ patthayamāno cātuddisatāya parissayānaṃ sahitā appaṭighatāya ca achambhī hutvā
atk-s0516a:589_0: Niddese mettāti atthato tāva mijjatīti mettā, sinehatīti attho. Mitte vā bhavā, mittassa
atk-s0516a:589_1: vā esā pavattītipi mettā. Mettāsahagatenāti mettāya samannāgatena. Cetasāti cittena.
atk-s0516a:589_2: Ekaṃ disanti ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāya ekaṃ disaṃ pariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena
atk-s0516a:589_3: vuttaṃ. Pharitvāti phusitvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Viharatīti brahmavihārādhiṭṭhitaṃ iriyāpathavihāraṃ
atk-s0516a:589_4: pavatteti. Tathā dutiyanti yathā puratthimādīsu disāsu yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0516a:589_5: viharati, tatheva tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthañcāti attho.
atk-s0516a:590_0: Iti uddhanti eteneva ca nayena uparimaṃ disanti vuttaṃ hoti. Adho tiriyanti adhodisampi
atk-s0516a:590_1: tiriyaṃ disampi evameva. Tattha ca adhoti heṭṭhā. Tiriyanti anudisā. Evaṃ sabbadisāsu
atk-s0516a:590_2: assamaṇḍale assamiva mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti. Ettāvatā ekamekaṃ
atk-s0516a:590_3: disaṃ pariggahetvā odhiso mettāpharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Sabbadhītiādi pana anodhiso dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0516a:590_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbadhīti sabbattha. Sabbattatāyāti sabbesu hīnamajjhimaukkaṭṭhamittasapattamajjhattānippabhedesu
atk-s0516a:590_5: attatāya, “ayaṃ parasatto”ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:591_0: Atha vā sabbattatāyāti sabbena cittabhāvena, īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:591_1: hoti. Sabbāvantanti sabbasattavantaṃ, sabbasattayuttanti attho. Lokanti sattalokaṃ.
atk-s0516a:591_2: Vipulenāti evamādipariyāyadassanato panettha puna “mettāsahagatenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā
atk-s0516a:591_3: vā ettha odhiso pharaṇe viya puna tathā-saddo iti-saddo vā na vutto, tasmā puna “mettāsahagatena
atk-s0516a:591_4: cetasā”ti vuttaṃ. Nigamanavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. Vipulenāti ettha ca pharaṇavasena
atk-s0516a:591_5: vipulatā daṭṭhabbā. Bhūmivasena pana taṃ mahaggataṃ. Paguṇavasena appamāṇasattārammaṇavasena
atk-s0516a:591_6: ca appamāṇaṃ. Byāpādapaccatthikappahānena averaṃ. Domanassappahānena abyāpajjaṃ.
atk-s0516a:591_7: Niddukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Karuṇā heṭṭhā vuttatthāyeva. Modanti tāya taṃsamaṅgino,
atk-s0516a:591_8: sayaṃ vā modati, modanamattameva vā sāti muditā. “Averā hontū”tiādibyāpādappahānena
atk-s0516a:592_0: Lakkhaṇādito panettha hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā mettā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0516a:592_1: sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Byāpādūpasamo etissā sampatti, sinehasambhavo
atk-s0516a:592_3: dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Vihiṃsūpasamo tassā sampatti, sokasambhavo
atk-s0516a:592_4: vipatti. Pamodalakkhaṇā muditā, anissāyanarasā, arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā, sattānaṃ
atk-s0516a:592_5: sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Arativūpasamo tassā sampatti, pahānasambhavo vipatti.
atk-s0516a:592_6: Sattesu majjhattākārappavattilakkhaṇā upekkhā, sattesu samabhāvadassanarasā, paṭighānunayavūpasamapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0516a:592_7: “kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissanti, dukkhato vā muccissanti,
atk-s0516a:592_8: pattasampattito vā na parihāyissantī”ti evaṃ pavattakammassakatādassanapadaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0516a:592_9: Paṭighānunayavūpasamo tassā sampatti, gehassitāya aññāṇupekkhāya sambhavo vipatti.
atk-s0516a:593_0: Tattha santuṭṭho hotīti paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho hoti. Itarītarena cīvarenāti
atk-s0516a:593_1: na thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ yena kenaci cīvarena, atha kho yathāladdhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:593_2: itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho. Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā – yathālābhasantoso,
atk-s0516a:593_3: yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti. Piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti ime tayo
atk-s0516a:593_4: santose sandhāya “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena. Yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci
atk-s0516a:594_0: Ettha ca cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarakhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarasantoso
atk-s0516a:594_1: jānitabbo, cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni. Tattha cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti
atk-s0516a:594_2: khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarānipi jānitabbāni. Imāni dvādasa
atk-s0516a:594_3: kappiyacīvarāni. Kusacīraṃ vākacīraṃ phalakacīraṃ kesakambalaṃ vāḷakambalaṃ potthako
atk-s0516a:594_4: cammaṃ ulūkapakkhaṃ rukkhadussaṃ latādussaṃ erakadussaṃ kadalidussaṃ veḷudussanti
atk-s0516a:595_0: Cīvarakhettanti “saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0516a:595_1: vā”ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni, aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena aṭṭha khettāni jānitabbāni.
atk-s0516a:596_0: Paṃsukūlanti sosānikaṃ pāpaṇikaṃ rathiyaṃ saṅkārakūṭaṃ sotthiyaṃ sinānaṃ titthaṃ
atk-s0516a:596_1: gatapaccāgataṃ aggiḍaḍḍhaṃ gokhāyitaṃ upacikākhāyitaṃ undūrakhāyitaṃ antacchinnaṃ
atk-s0516a:596_2: dasacchinnaṃ dhajāhaṭaṃ thūpaṃ samaṇacīvaraṃ sāmuddiyaṃ ābhisekiyaṃ panthikaṃ vātāhaṭaṃ
atk-s0516a:596_3: iddhimayaṃ devadattiyanti tevīsati paṃsukūlāni veditabbāni. Ettha ca sotthiyanti
atk-s0516a:596_4: gabbhamalaharaṇaṃ. Gatapaccāgatanti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0516a:596_5: Dhajāhaṭanti dhajaṃ ussāpetvā tato ānītaṃ. Thūpanti vammike pūjitacīvaraṃ. Sāmuddiyanti
atk-s0516a:596_6: samuddavīcīhi thalaṃ pāpitaṃ. Panthikanti panthaṃ gacchantehi corabhayena pāsāṇehi
atk-s0516a:596_7: koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ. Iddhimayanti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0516a:597_0: Cīvarasantosoti vīsati cīvarasantosā – cīvare vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso
atk-s0516a:597_2: yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantoso udakasantoso dhovanasantoso karaṇasantoso parimāṇasantoso
atk-s0516a:597_3: suttasantoso sibbanasantoso rajanasantoso kappasantoso paribhogasantoso sannidhiparivajjanasantoso
atk-s0516a:597_4: vissajjanasantosoti. Tattha sādakabhikkhuno temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ
atk-s0516a:597_5: vitakkituṃ vaṭṭati. So hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti. Paṃsukūliko addhamāseneva
atk-s0516a:597_6: karoti. Idaṃ māsaddhamāsamattaṃ vitakkanaṃ vitakkasantoso. Cīvaratthāya gacchantassa
atk-s0516a:597_7: pana “kattha labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamanaṃ gamanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:597_8: Pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā lajjiṃ pesalabhikkhuṃ gahetvā
atk-s0516a:597_9: pariyesanaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma. Evaṃ pariyesantassa āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūratova
atk-s0516a:597_10: disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati, etaṃ amanāpa”nti evaṃ avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu
atk-s0516a:597_11: yathāladdheneva santussanaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma. Evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi “ettakaṃ
atk-s0516a:597_12: dupaṭṭassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā”ti attano pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ
atk-s0516a:597_13: mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma. Cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa pana “asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ
atk-s0516a:597_14: labhissāmī”ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_0: Lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ yathālābhasantoso
atk-s0516a:598_1: nāma. Attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti, tena yāpanaṃ yathābalasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_2: Manāpaṃ aññassa datvā attanā yena kenaci yāpanaṃ yathāsāruppasantoso nāma. “Kattha
atk-s0516a:598_3: udakaṃ manāpaṃ, kattha amanāpa”nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanupagena udakena dhovanaṃ
atk-s0516a:598_4: udakasantoso nāma. Tathā paṇḍumattikagerukapūtipaṇṇarasakiliṭṭhāni pana udakāni vajjetuṃ
atk-s0516a:598_5: vaṭṭati. Dhovantassa pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ dhovanasantoso
atk-s0516a:598_6: nāma. Tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ
atk-s0516a:598_7: dhovitvā karontassa “idaṃ thūlaṃ, idaṃ sukhuma”nti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva karaṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:598_8: karaṇasantoso nāma. Timaṇḍalapaṭicchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ parimāṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_9: Cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana “manāpaṃ suttaṃ pariyesissāmī”ti avicāretvā rathikādīsu vā
atk-s0516a:598_10: devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃ kiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ suttasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:599_0: Kusibandhanakāle pana aṅgulimatte sattavāre na vijjhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa hi yo
atk-s0516a:599_1: bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti, tassa vattabhedopi natthi. Tivaṅgulamatte pana sattavāre
atk-s0516a:599_2: vijjhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa maggapaṭipannenāpi sahāyena bhavitabbaṃ. Yo na hoti,
atk-s0516a:599_3: tassa vattabhedo. Ayaṃ sibbanasantoso nāma. Rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena
atk-s0516a:599_4: na rajitabbaṃ, somavakkalādīsu yaṃ labhati, tena rajitabbaṃ. Alabhantena pana manussehi
atk-s0516a:599_5: araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā
atk-s0516a:599_6: rajitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ rajanasantoso nāma. Nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu yaṃ kiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe
atk-s0516a:600_0: Hirikopīnapaṭicchādanamattavasena paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso nāma. Dussaṃ pana
atk-s0516a:600_1: labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, labhantena na
atk-s0516a:600_2: vaṭṭati. Katampi ce antevāsikādīnaṃ dātukāmo hoti, te ca asannihitā, yāva āgamanā
atk-s0516a:600_3: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, āgatamattesu tesu dātabbaṃ. Dātuṃ asakkontena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Aññasmiṃ
atk-s0516a:600_4: cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati. Anadhiṭṭhitameva hi sannidhi hoti.
atk-s0516a:600_5: Adhiṭṭhitaṃ na hotīti mahāsīvatthero āha. Ayaṃ sannidhiparivajjanasantoso nāma. Vissajjentena
atk-s0516a:600_6: pana mukhaṃ oloketvā na dātabbaṃ, sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvāva vissajjetabbanti ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:601_0: Cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgañceva tecīvarikaṅgañca. Iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0516a:601_1: pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti, imāni gopento cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsavasena santuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0516a:602_0: Vaṇṇavādīti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti. Eko na santuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0516a:602_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0516a:602_2: Eko santuṭṭho ca hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Tathārūpo so paccekasambuddho
atk-s0516a:603_1: ayuttaṃ. Aladdhā cāti alabhitvā. Yathā ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0516a:603_2: puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0516a:603_3: paccekasambuddho evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati. Laddhā cāti dhammena samena
atk-s0516a:603_4: labhitvā. Adhigatoti vigatalobhagiddho. Amucchitoti adhimattataṇhāya mucchanaṃ anāpanno.
atk-s0516a:603_5: Anajjhāpannoti taṇhāya anotthaṭo apariyonaddho. Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca
atk-s0516a:603_6: gadhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. Nissaraṇapaññoti “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti
atk-s0516a:604_0: Itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyāti yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭhiyā. Nevattānukkaṃsetīti
atk-s0516a:604_1: yathā panidhekacco “ahaṃ paṃsukūliko, mayā upasampadamāḷeyeva paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0516a:604_2: ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti attukkaṃsanaṃ karoti. Evaṃ so attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. Na
atk-s0516a:604_3: paraṃ vambhetīti “ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikāti vā paṃsukūlikamattampi etesaṃ
atk-s0516a:604_4: natthī”ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti. Yo hi tattha dakkhoti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose
atk-s0516a:604_5: vaṇṇavādī. Tāsu vā dakkho cheko byatto. Analasoti sātaccakiriyāya ālasiyavirahito.
atk-s0516a:604_6: Sampajāno patissatoti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā ca yutto. Ariyavaṃse ṭhitoti ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0516a:605_0: Itarītarena piṇḍapātenāti yena kenaci piṇḍapātena. Etthapi piṇḍapāto jānitabbo, piṇḍapātakhettaṃ
atk-s0516a:605_1: jānitabbaṃ, piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabbo, piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:605_2: Tattha piṇḍapātoti odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ
atk-s0516a:605_3: telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ yāgu khādanīyaṃ sāyanīyaṃ lehanīyanti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.
atk-s0516a:606_0: Piṇḍapātakhettanti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ
atk-s0516a:606_1: uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ
atk-s0516a:606_2: dhurabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ vihārabhattanti pannarasa piṇḍapātakhettāni.
atk-s0516a:607_0: Piṇḍapātasantosoti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso
atk-s0516a:607_3: sannidhiparivajjanasantoso vissajjanasantosoti pannarasa santosā. Tattha sādako bhikkhu
atk-s0516a:607_4: mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi. Piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ caratā sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhānakāle
atk-s0516a:607_5: “sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti “asukagāme, bhante”ti ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0516a:607_6: na vitakketabbaṃ. Ekacārikena vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā vitakketabbaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya vitakkento
atk-s0516a:607_7: pana ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro. Ayaṃ vitakkasantoso nāma. Piṇḍāya pavisantena
atk-s0516a:607_8: pana “kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ. Ayaṃ gamanasantoso
atk-s0516a:607_9: nāma. Pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā aggahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:607_10: Ayaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma. Dūratova āhariyamānaṃ disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ, etaṃ amanāpa”nti
atk-s0516a:607_11: cittaṃ na uppādetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma. “Idaṃ manāpaṃ gaṇhissāmi, idaṃ
atk-s0516a:607_12: amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti acintetvā yaṃ kiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva. Ayaṃ paṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:608_0: Ettha pana deyyadhammo bahu, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammo
atk-s0516a:608_1: bahu, dāyakopi bahudātukāmo, pamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammopi na bahu, dāyakopi
atk-s0516a:608_2: appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyako pana bahudātukāmo,
atk-s0516a:608_3: pamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti,
atk-s0516a:608_4: saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, sāsanaṃ na karoti. Vijātamātuyāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0516a:608_5: Iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma. Aḍḍhakulāniyeva
atk-s0516a:608_6: agantvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ. Ayaṃ loluppavivajjanasantoso nāma. Yathālābhasantosādayo
atk-s0516a:609_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā “samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmī”ti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ
atk-s0516a:609_1: upakārasantoso nāma. Pattaṃ pūretvā ānītaṃ na paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Anupasampanne sati
atk-s0516a:609_2: tena gāhāpetabbaṃ, asati āharāpetvā paṭiggahaṇaparimāṇamattaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ parimāṇasantoso
atk-s0516a:609_3: nāma. Jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ “na idamettha nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso
atk-s0516a:609_4: nāma. Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ sannidhiparivajjanasantoso nāma. Mukhaṃ
atk-s0516a:609_5: anoloketvā sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitena vissajjetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:610_0: Piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ
atk-s0516a:610_2: pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti, imāni gopento piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsavasena
atk-s0516a:611_0: Senāsanānīti idha senāsanaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanakhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanasantoso
atk-s0516a:611_1: jānitabbo, senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttadhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tattha senāsananti mañco pīṭhaṃ
atk-s0516a:611_2: bhisi bimbohanaṃ vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā leṇaṃ aṭṭo māḷo veḷugumbo
atk-s0516a:611_3: rukkhamūlaṃ yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
atk-s0516a:612: Senāsanakhettanti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vāti cha khettāni.
atk-s0516a:613_0: Senāsanasantosoti senāsane vitakkasantosādayo pannarasa santosā. Te piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva
atk-s0516a:613_1: veditabbā. Senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ
atk-s0516a:613_2: abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅganti. Iti senāsanasantosaṃ mahāariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0516a:613_3: pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti, imāni gopento senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsavasena santuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0516a:614_0: Iti āyasmā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ
atk-s0516a:614_1: pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayamāno viya ca paṭhamaṃ cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0516a:614_2: kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ ullaṅghento viya ca dutiyapiṇḍapātasantosaṃ
atk-s0516a:614_3: kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipento viya tatiyaṃ senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā idāni
atk-s0516a:614_6: Bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃso pana idha anāgato, nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0516a:617_0: Porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhitoti ettha porāṇeti na adhunuppattike. Aggaññeti aggehi
atk-s0516a:617_1: jānitabbe. Ariyavaṃseti ariyānaṃ vaṃse. Yathā hi khattiyavaṃso brāhmaṇavaṃso vessavaṃso
atk-s0516a:617_2: suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso, evamayampi aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso, ariyatanti
atk-s0516a:617_3: ariyapaveṇi nāma hoti. So kho panāyaṃ vaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ kālānusārigandhādayo
atk-s0516a:617_4: viya aggamakkhāyati. Ke pana te ariyā, yesaṃ eso vaṃsoti? Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca
atk-s0516a:617_5: paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca, etesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso. Ito pubbe
atk-s0516a:617_6: hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro
atk-s0516a:617_7: saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā uppannā, te ariyā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti
atk-s0516a:617_8: ariyavaṃso. Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño
atk-s0516a:617_9: nāma buddho uppanno…pe… imasmiṃ kappe kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo amhākaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0516a:617_10: gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso. Api ca atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
atk-s0516a:617_11: sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso, tasmiṃ ariyavaṃse.
atk-s0516a:619_0: 129. Navame ayaṃ yojanā – dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke, ye asantosābhibhūtā, tathāvidhā
atk-s0516a:619_1: eva ca atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā. Etamahaṃ dussaṅgahabhāvaṃ jigucchanto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0516a:619_2: ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:620_0: Niddese anassavāti vacanaṃ assavanakā. Avacanakarāti dubbacā. Paṭilomavuttinoti paccanīkaṃ
atk-s0516a:620_1: kathanasīlā, paṭimallā hutvā pavattantīti attho. Aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti ovādadāyake
atk-s0516a:620_2: disvā mukhaṃ parivattetvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ olokenti. Abyāvaṭo hutvāti avāvaṭo hutvā.
atk-s0516a:622_1: Etāni gihibhāvaṃ byañjayanti, tasmā “gihibyañjanānī”ti vuccanti. Sañchinnapattoti
atk-s0516a:622_2: patitapatto. Chetvānāti maggañāṇena chinditvā. Vīroti maggavīriyasamannāgato. Gihibandhanānīti
atk-s0516a:622_3: kāmabandhanāni. Kāmā hi gihīnaṃ bandhanāni. Ayaṃ tāva padattho.
atk-s0516a:623_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyo – “aho vatāhampi oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni sañchinnapatto yathā
atk-s0516a:623_1: koviḷāro bhaveyya”nti evañhi cintayamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:624: Niddese sārāsanañcāti sāraṃ āsanaṃ. Chinnānīti gaḷitāni. Sañchinnānīti nipaṇṇāni. Patitānīti vaṇṭato muttāni. Paripatitānīti bhūmiyaṃ patitāni.
atk-s0516a:628_0: 131-2. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhamadvaye nipakanti pakatinipuṇaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kasiṇaparikammādīsu
atk-s0516a:628_1: kusalaṃ. Sādhuvihārinti appanāvihārena vā upacārena vā samannāgataṃ. Dhīranti dhitisampannaṃ.
atk-s0516a:628_2: Tattha nipakattena dhitisampadā vuttā. Idha pana dhitisampannamevāti attho. Dhiti
atk-s0516a:628_3: nāma asithilaparakkamatā, “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:628_4: Api ca dhikkatapāpotipi dhīro. Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāyāti yathā paṭirājā “vijitaṃ
atk-s0516a:628_5: raṭṭhaṃ anatthāvaha”nti ñatvā rajjaṃ pahāya eko carati evaṃ bālasahāyaṃ pahāya eko
atk-s0516a:628_6: care. Atha vā rājāva raṭṭhanti yathā sutasomo rājā vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pahāya eko cari,
atk-s0516a:628_7: yathā ca mahājanako evaṃ ekova careti ayampi etassattho. Sesaṃ vuttānusārena sakkā
atk-s0516a:628_8: jānitunti na vitthāritaṃ. Niddese vattabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0516a:630_0: 133. Tatiyagāthā padatthato uttānā eva. Kevalañca pana sahāyasampadanti ettha asekkhehi
atk-s0516a:630_1: sīlādikkhandhehi sampannā sahāyā eva “sahāyasampadā”ti veditabbā. Ayaṃ panettha yojanā
atk-s0516a:630_2: – yā ayaṃ vuttā sahāyasampadā, taṃ sahāyasampadaṃ addhā pasaṃsāma, ekaṃseneva thomemāti
atk-s0516a:630_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Seṭṭhā samāsevitabbā sahāyāti. Kasmā? Attano sīlādīhi seṭṭhe
atk-s0516a:630_4: sevamānassa sīlādayo dhammā anuppannā uppajjanti, uppannā vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ
atk-s0516a:630_5: pāpuṇanti. Same sevamānassa aññamaññasamadhāraṇena kukkuccavinodanena ca laddhā na
atk-s0516a:630_6: parihāyanti. Ete pana sahāyake seṭṭhe ca same ca aladdhā kuhanādimicchājīvaṃ vajjetvā
atk-s0516a:630_7: dhammena samena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto tattha ca paṭighānunayaṃ anuppādento
atk-s0516a:630_8: anavajjabhojī hutvā atthakāmo kulaputto eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. Ahampi hi evaṃ
atk-s0516a:630_9: caranto imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatomhīti. Niddeso vuttanayo eva.
atk-s0516a:632_0: 134. Catutthe disvāti oloketvā. Suvaṇṇassāti kañcanassa. “Valayānī”ti pāṭhaseso.
atk-s0516a:632_1: Sāvasesapāṭho hi ayaṃ attho. Pabhassarānīti pabhāsanasīlāni, jutimantānīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:632_2: hoti. Sesaṃ uttānapadatthameva. Ayaṃ pana yojanā – disvā bhujasmiṃ suvaṇṇassa valayāni
atk-s0516a:632_3: “gaṇavāse sati saṅghaṭṭanā, ekavāse sati aghaṭṭanā”ti evaṃ cintento vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0516a:632_4: paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti. Nūpurānīti valayāni. “Niyurā”ti
atk-s0516a:634_0: 135. Pañcamagāthā padatthato uttānā eva. Ayaṃ pana ettha adhippāyo – yvāyaṃ etena
atk-s0516a:634_1: dutīyena kumārena sītuṇhādīni nivedentena sahavāsena taṃ saññāpentassa mama vācābhilāpo,
atk-s0516a:634_2: tasmiṃ sinehavasena abhisajjanā vā jātā. Sace ahaṃ imaṃ na pariccajāmi, tato āyatimpi
atk-s0516a:634_3: tatheva hessati. Yathā idāni, evaṃ dutīyena saha mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā
atk-s0516a:634_4: vā. Ubhayampi cetaṃ antarāyakaraṃ visesādhigamassāti etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno
atk-s0516a:634_5: taṃ chaḍḍetvā yoniso paṭipajjitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0516a:636_0: 136. Chaṭṭhe kāmāti dve kāmā vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca. Tattha vatthukāmā manāpiyā
atk-s0516a:636_1: rūpādayo dhammā, kilesakāmā chandādayo sabbepi rāgappabhedā. Idha pana vatthukāmā
atk-s0516a:636_2: adhippetā. Rūpādianekappakārena citrā. Lokassādavasena madhurā. Bālaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-s0516a:636_3: manaṃ ramentīti manoramā. Virūparūpenāti virūpena rūpena, anekavidhena sabhāvenāti
atk-s0516a:636_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Te hi rūpādivasena citrā, rūpādīsupi nīlādivasena vividharūpā. Evaṃ
atk-s0516a:636_5: tena virūparūpena tathā tathā assādaṃ dassetvā mathenti cittaṃ, pabbajjāya abhiramituṃ
atk-s0516a:636_6: na dentīti. Sesamettha pākaṭameva. Nigamanampi dvīhi tīhi vā padehi yojetvā purimagāthāsu
atk-s0516a:637_0: Kāmaguṇāti kāmayitabbaṭṭhena kāmā. Bandhanaṭṭhena guṇā. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ahatānaṃ
atk-s0516a:637_1: vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. “Accenti kālā tarayanti
atk-s0516a:637_2: rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. “Sataguṇā dakkhiṇā
atk-s0516a:637_3: pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti ettha ānisaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. “Antaṃ antaguṇaṃ, kayirā mālāguṇe
atk-s0516a:637_4: bahū”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. Idhāpi eseva adhippeto, tena vuttaṃ – “bandhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:637_5: guṇā”ti. Cakkhuviññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇena passitabbā. Etenupāyena sotaviññeyyādīsupi
atk-s0516a:637_6: attho veditabbo. Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu, mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Kantāti
atk-s0516a:637_7: kāmanīyā. Manāpāti manavaḍḍhanakā. Piyarūpāti piyajātikā. Kāmūpasaṃhitāti ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:637_8: katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā. Rajanīyāti rajjaniyā, rāguppattikāraṇabhūtāti attho.
atk-s0516a:638_0: Yadi muddāyātiādīsu muddāti aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā hatthamuddā. Gaṇanāti acchiddagaṇanā.
atk-s0516a:638_1: Saṅkhānanti piṇḍagaṇanā. Yāya khettaṃ oloketvā “idha ettakā vīhī bhavissanti”, rukkhaṃ
atk-s0516a:638_2: oloketvā “idha ettakāni phalāni bhavissanti”, ākāsaṃ oloketvā “ime ākāse sakuṇā ettakā
atk-s0516a:638_3: nāma bhavissantī”ti jānanti. Kasīti kasikammaṃ. Vaṇijjāti jaṅghavaṇijjathalavaṇijjādivaṇippatho.
atk-s0516a:638_4: Gorakkhanti attano vā paresaṃ vā gāvo rakkhitvā pañcagorasavikkayena jīvanakammaṃ.
atk-s0516a:638_5: Issattho vuccati āvudhaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhānakammaṃ. Rājaporisanti vinā āvudhena rājakammaṃ
atk-s0516a:639_0: Sītassa purakkhatoti lakkhaṃ viya sarassa sītassa purato ṭhito, sītena bādhiyamānoti
atk-s0516a:639_1: attho. Uṇhepi eseva nayo. Ḍaṃsādīsu ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikā. Makasāti sabbamakkhikā.
atk-s0516a:639_2: Sarīsapāti ye keci saritvā gacchanti. Rissamānoti pīḷiyamāno ruppamāno ghaṭṭiyamāno.
atk-s0516a:639_3: Mīyamānoti maramāno. Ayaṃ, bhikkhaveti bhikkhave, ayaṃ muddādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ āgamma
atk-s0516a:639_4: sītādipaccayo ābādho. Kāmānaṃ ādīnavoti kāmesu upaddavo, upasaggoti attho. Sandiṭṭhikoti
atk-s0516a:639_5: paccakkho sāmaṃ passitabbo. Dukkhakkhandhoti dukkharāsi. Kāmahetūtiādīsu paccayaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:639_6: kāmā assa hetūti kāmahetu. Mūlaṭṭhena kāmā nidānamassāti kāmanidāno. Liṅgavipallāsena
atk-s0516a:639_7: pana “kāmanidāna”nti vutto. Kāraṇaṭṭhena kāmā adhikaraṇaṃ assāti kāmādhikaraṇo. Liṅgavipallāseneva
atk-s0516a:639_8: pana “kāmādhikaraṇa”nti vutto. Kāmānameva hetūti idaṃ niyamavacanaṃ kāmapaccayā uppajjatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0516a:640_0: Uṭṭhahatoti ājīvasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyena uṭṭhahantassa. Ghaṭatoti taṃ vīriyaṃ pubbenāparaṃ
atk-s0516a:640_1: ghaṭentassa. Vāyamatoti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ payogaṃ karontassa. Nābhinipphajjantīti
atk-s0516a:640_2: na nipphajjanti, hatthaṃ nābhiruhanti. Socatīti citte uppannabalavasokena socati.
atk-s0516a:640_3: Kilamatīti kāye uppannadukkhena kilamati. Paridevatīti vācāya paridevati. Urattāḷinti
atk-s0516a:640_4: uraṃ tāḷetvā. Kandatīti rodati. Sammohaṃ āpajjatīti visaññī viya sammūḷho hoti. Moghanti
atk-s0516a:641_0: Ārakkhādhikaraṇanti ārakkhakāraṇā. Kinti meti kena nu kho me upāyena. Yampi meti
atk-s0516a:641_1: yampi mayhaṃ kasikammādīni katvā uppāditaṃ dhanaṃ ahosi. Tampi no natthīti tampi
atk-s0516a:642_0: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetūtiādināpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvāva ādīnavaṃ dīpeti. Tattha
atk-s0516a:642_1: kāmahetūti kāmapaccayā rājānopi rājūhi vivadantīti attho. Kāmanidānanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ,
atk-s0516a:642_2: kāme nidānaṃ katvā vivadantīti attho. Kāmādhikaraṇantipi bhāvanapuṃsakameva, kāme
atk-s0516a:642_3: adhikaraṇaṃ katvā vivadantīti attho. Kāmānameva hetūti gāmanigamasenāpatipurohitaṭṭhānantarādīnaṃ
atk-s0516a:642_4: kāmānaṃyeva hetu vivadantīti attho. Upakkamantīti paharanti.
atk-s0516a:644_0: Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti dhanuṃ gahetvā sarakalāpaṃ sannayhitvā. Ubhatobyūḷhanti
atk-s0516a:644_1: ubhatorāsibhūtaṃ. Pakkhandantīti pavisanti. Usūsūti kaṇḍesu. Vijjotalantesūti parivattamānesu.
atk-s0516a:645_0: Addāvalepanā upakāriyoti cettha manussā pākārapādaṃ assakhurasaṇṭhānena iṭṭhakāhi
atk-s0516a:645_1: cinitvā upari sudhāya limpanti. Evaṃ katapākārapādā “upakāriyo”ti vuccanti. Tā tintena
atk-s0516a:645_2: kalalena sittā addāvalepanā nāma honti. Pakkhandantīti tāsaṃ heṭṭhā tikhiṇaayasūlarukkhasūlādīhi
atk-s0516a:645_3: vijjhiyamānā pākārassa picchillabhāvena ārohituṃ asakkontāpi upadhāvantiyeva. Chakaṇakāyāti
atk-s0516a:645_4: kuthitagomayena. Abhivaggenāti satadantena. Taṃ aṭṭhadantākārena katvā “nagaradvāraṃ
atk-s0516a:645_5: bhinditvā pavisissāmā”ti āgate uparidvāre ṭhitā tassa bandhanayottāni chinditvā tena
atk-s0516a:646_0: Sandhimpi chindantīti gharasandhimpi. Nillopanti gāme paharitvā mahāvilopaṃ karonti.
atk-s0516a:646_1: Ekāgārikanti paṇṇāsamattāpi saṭṭhimattāpi parivāretvā jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā dhanaṃ āharāpenti.
atk-s0516a:646_2: Paripanthepi tiṭṭhantīti panthadūhanakammaṃ karonti. Aḍḍhadaṇḍakehīti muggarehi.
atk-s0516a:648_0: 137. Sattame etīti īti, āgantukānaṃ akusalabhāgiyānaṃ byasanahetūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:648_1: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpi ete anekabyasanāvahaṭṭhena daḷhasannipātaṭṭhena ca īti. Gaṇḍopi
atk-s0516a:648_2: asuciṃ paggharati, uddhumātaparipakkaparibhinno hoti. Tasmā ete kilesā asucipaggharaṇato
atk-s0516a:648_3: uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkaparibhinnabhāvato ca gaṇḍo. Upaddavatīti upaddavo,
atk-s0516a:648_4: anatthaṃ janento abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho, rāgagaṇḍādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:648_5: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpete aviditanibbānatthāvahahetutāya sabbupaddavavatthutāya ca upaddavo.
atk-s0516a:648_6: Yasmā panete kilesāturabhāvaṃ janentā sīlasaṅkhātamārogyaṃ loluppaṃ vā uppādentā
atk-s0516a:648_7: pākatikameva ārogyaṃ vilumpanti, tasmā iminā ārogyavilumpanaṭṭhena rogo. Abbhantaramanupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:648_8: pana antotudanaṭṭhena dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhayāvahanato
atk-s0516a:648_9: bhayaṃ. Metanti etaṃ sesamettha pākaṭameva. Nigamanampi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:649_0: Kāmarāgarattāyanti kāmarāgena ratto ayaṃ. Chandarāgavinibaddhoti chandarāgena snehena
atk-s0516a:649_1: baddho. Diṭṭhadhammikāpi gabbhāti imasmiṃ attabhāve vattamānasaḷāyatanagabbhā. Samparāyikāpi
atk-s0516a:649_2: gabbhāti paralokepi saḷāyatanagabbhā. Na parimuccatīti parimuccituṃ na sakkoti. Otiṇṇo
atk-s0516a:649_3: sātarūpenāti madhurasabhāvena rāgena otiṇṇo ogāhito. Palipathanti kāmakalalamaggaṃ. Dugganti duggamaṃ.
atk-s0516a:651_1: Tathā uṇhaṃ. Tattha ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikā. Sarīsapeti ye keci dīghajātikā saritvā
atk-s0516a:651_2: gacchanti. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Nigamanampi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:653_0: 139. Navamagāthā padatthato pākaṭā eva. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyayojanā – sā ca kho
atk-s0516a:653_1: yuttivasena, na anussavavasena. Yathā ayaṃ hatthī manussakantesu sīlesu dantattā
atk-s0516a:653_2: adantabhūmiṃ nāgacchatīti vā, sarīramahantatāya vā nāgo. Evaṃ kudāssu nāmāhampi ariyakantesu
atk-s0516a:653_3: sīlesu dantattā adantabhūmiṃ nāgamanena, āguṃ akaraṇena, puna itthattaṃ anāgamanena
atk-s0516a:653_4: ca guṇasarīramahantatāya vā nāgo bhaveyyaṃ. Yathā cesa yūthāni vivajjayitvā ekacariyasukhena
atk-s0516a:653_5: yathābhirantaṃ vihare araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo, kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ
atk-s0516a:653_6: gaṇaṃ vivajjayitvā ekattābhiratisukhena jhānasukhena yathābhirantaṃ araññe attano
atk-s0516a:653_7: yathā yathā sukhaṃ, tathā tathā yattakaṃ vā icchāmi, tattakaṃ araññe nivāsaṃ eko
atk-s0516a:653_8: care khaggavisāṇakappo eko careyyanti attho. Yathā cesa susaṇṭhitakkhandhamahantatāya
atk-s0516a:653_9: sañjātakkhandho, kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ asekkhasīlakkhandhamahantatāya sañjātakkhandho
atk-s0516a:653_10: bhaveyyaṃ. Yathā cesa padumasadisagattatāya vā, padumakule uppannatāya vā padumī,
atk-s0516a:653_11: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ padumasadisabojjhaṅgamahantatāya vā, ariyajātipadume uppannatāya
atk-s0516a:653_12: vā padumī bhaveyyaṃ. Yathā cesa thāmabalajavādīhi uḷāro, kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ parisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi
atk-s0516a:653_13: sīlasamādhinibbedhikapaññādīhi vā uḷāro bhaveyyanti evaṃ cintento vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0516a:655_0: 140. Dasame aṭṭhānatanti aṭṭhānaṃ taṃ, akāraṇaṃ tanti vuttaṃ hoti. Anunāsikassa lopo
atk-s0516a:655_1: kato “ariyasaccāna dassana”ntiādīsu viya. Saṅgaṇikāratassāti gaṇābhiratassa. Yanti
atk-s0516a:655_2: kāraṇavacanametaṃ “yaṃ hirīyati hirīyitabbenā”tiādīsu viya. Phassayeti adhigacche.
atk-s0516a:655_3: Sāmayikaṃ vimuttinti lokiyasamāpattiṃ. Sā hi appitappitasamaye eva paccanīkehi vimuccanato
atk-s0516a:655_4: “sāmayikā vimuttī”ti vuccati. Taṃ sāmayikaṃ vimuttiṃ. “Aṭṭhānaṃ taṃ, na taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0516a:655_5: vijjati saṅgaṇikāratassa, yena kāraṇena phassaye iti etaṃ ādiccabandhussa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0516a:655_6: vaco nisamma saṅgaṇikāratiṃ pahāya yoniso paṭipajjanto adhigatomhī”ti āha. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0516a:656_1: sukhaṃ. Upasamasukhanti kilesupasamaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Sambodhisukhanti maggasukhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:656_2: Nikāmalābhīti attano rucivasena yathākāmalābhī. Akicchalābhīti adukkhalābhī. Akasiralābhīti
atk-s0516a:656_3: vipulalābhī. Asāmayikanti lokuttaraṃ. Akuppanti kuppavirahitaṃ acalitaṃ lokuttaramaggaṃ.
atk-s0516a:660_0: 141. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame diṭṭhīvisūkānīti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni. Tāni hi maggasammādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0516a:660_1: visūkaṭṭhena vijjhanaṭṭhena vilomaṭṭhena ca visūkāni. Evaṃ diṭṭhiyā visūkānīti diṭṭhivisūkāni,
atk-s0516a:660_2: diṭṭhiyo eva vā visūkāni diṭṭhivisūkāni. Upātivattoti dassanamaggena atikkanto. Patto
atk-s0516a:660_3: niyāmanti avinipātadhammatāya sambodhiparāyanatāya ca niyatabhāvaṃ adhigato, sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0516a:660_4: vā paṭhamamagganti. Ettāvatā paṭhamamaggakiccanipphatti ca tassa paṭilābho ca vutto.
atk-s0516a:660_5: Idāni paṭiladdhamaggoti iminā sesamaggapaṭilābhaṃ dasseti. Uppannañāṇomhīti uppannapaccekabodhiñāṇo
atk-s0516a:660_6: amhi. Etena phalaṃ dasseti. Anaññaneyyoti aññehi “idaṃ saccaṃ idaṃ sacca”nti nanetabbo.
atk-s0516a:660_7: Etena sayambhutaṃ dīpeti. Patte vā paccekabodhiñāṇe aññaneyyatāya abhāvā sayaṃvasitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:660_8: Samathavipassanāya vā diṭṭhivisūkāni upātivatto, ādimaggena patto niyāmaṃ, sesehi
atk-s0516a:660_9: paṭiladdhamaggo, phalañāṇena uppannañāṇo, taṃ sabbaṃ attanāva adhigatoti anaññaneyyo.
atk-s0516a:661_0: Na paraneyyoti na aññehi netabbo. Na parappattiyoti paccakkhadhammattā na aññehi
atk-s0516a:661_1: saddahāpetabbo. Na parappaccayoti na assa paro paccayo, na parassa saddhāya vattatīti
atk-s0516a:661_2: na parappaccayo. Na parapaṭibaddhagūti na aññesaṃ paṭibaddhañāṇagamano.
atk-s0516a:663_0: 142. Dutiye nillolupoti alolupo. Yo hi rasataṇhābhibhūto hoti, so bhusaṃ luppati
atk-s0516a:663_1: punappunañca luppati, tena “lolupo”ti vuccati. Tasmā esa taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “nillolupo”ti.
atk-s0516a:663_2: Nikkuhoti ettha kiñcāpi yassa tividhakuhanavatthu natthi, so “nikkuho”ti vuccati,
atk-s0516a:663_3: imissā pana gāthāya manuññabhojanādīsu vimhayamanāpajjanato nikkuhoti ayamadhippāyo.
atk-s0516a:663_4: Nippipāsoti ettha pātumicchā pipāsā, tassā abhāvena nippipāso, sādurasalobhena bhottukamyatāvirahitoti
atk-s0516a:663_5: attho. Nimmakkhoti ettha paraguṇavināsanalakkhaṇo makkho, tassa abhāvena nimmakkho.
atk-s0516a:663_6: Attano gahaṭṭhakāle sūdassa guṇamakkhanābhāvaṃ sandhāya āha. Niddhantakasāvamohoti
atk-s0516a:663_7: ettha rāgādayo tayo kāyaduccaritādīni ca tīṇīti cha dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ appasannaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:663_8: sakabhāvaṃ vijahāpetvā parabhāvaṃ gaṇhāpanaṭṭhena kasaṭaṭṭhena ca “kasāvā”ti veditabbā. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:664: “Tattha katame tayo kasāvā? Rāgakasāvo dosakasāvo mohakasāvo, ime tayo kasāvā. Tattha katame aparepi tayo kasāvā? Kāyakasāvo vacīkasāvo manokasāvo”ti.
atk-s0516a:665_0: Tesu mohaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ kasāvānaṃ tesañca sabbesaṃ mūlabhūtassa mohassa niddhantattā
atk-s0516a:665_1: niddhantakasāvamoho, tiṇṇaṃ eva vā kāyavacīmanokasāvānaṃ mohassa ca niddhantattā
atk-s0516a:665_2: niddhantakasāvamoho. Itaresu nillolupatādīhi rāgakasāvassa, nimmakkhatāya dosakasāvassa
atk-s0516a:665_3: niddhantabhāvo siddho eva. Nirāsasoti nittaṇho. Sabbaloketi sakalaloke, tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0516a:665_4: dvādasasu vā āyatanesu bhavavibhavataṇhāvirahito hutvāti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0516a:665_5: veditabbaṃ. Atha vā tayopi pāde vatvā eko careti eko carituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti evampi
atk-s0516a:667_0: 143. Tatiye ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yvāyaṃ dasavatthukāya pāpadiṭṭhiyā samannāgatattā
atk-s0516a:667_1: pāpo. Paresampi anatthaṃ dassetīti anatthadassī. Kāyaduccaritādimhi ca visame niviṭṭho.
atk-s0516a:667_2: Taṃ atthakāmo kulaputto pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha, anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:667_3: Sayaṃ na seveti attano vasena taṃ na seveyya. Yadi pana paravaso hoti, kiṃ sakkā
atk-s0516a:667_4: kātunti vuttaṃ hoti. Pasutanti pasaṭaṃ, diṭṭhivasena tattha tattha lagganti attho.
atk-s0516a:667_5: Pamattanti kāmaguṇesu vossaṭṭhacittaṃ, kusalabhāvanārahitaṃ vā. Taṃ evarūpaṃ na seve
atk-s0516a:667_6: na bhaje na payirupāse, aññadatthu eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0516a:668_0: Niddese sayaṃ na seveyyāti sāmaṃ na upasaṅkameyya. Sāmaṃ na seveyyāti cittenapi na
atk-s0516a:668_1: upasaṅkameyya. Na seveyyāti na bhajeyya. Na niseveyyāti samīpampi na gaccheyya. Na
atk-s0516a:668_2: saṃseveyyāti dūre bhaveyya. Na parisaṃseveyyāti paṭikkameyya.
atk-s0516a:670_0: 144. Catutthe ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – bahussutanti duvidho bahussuto tīsu piṭakesu atthato
atk-s0516a:670_1: nikhilo pariyattibahussuto ca maggaphalavijjābhiññānaṃ paṭividdhattā paṭivedhabahussuto
atk-s0516a:670_2: ca. Āgatāgamo dhammadharo. Uḷārehi pana kāyavacīmanokammehi samannāgato uḷāro. Yuttapaṭibhāno
atk-s0516a:670_3: ca muttapaṭibhāno ca yuttamuttapaṭibhāno ca paṭibhānavā. Pariyattiparipucchādhigamavasena
atk-s0516a:670_4: vā tidhā paṭibhānavā veditabbo. Yassa hi pariyatti paṭibhāti, so pariyattipaṭibhānavā.
atk-s0516a:670_5: Yassa atthañca ñāyañca lakkhaṇañca ṭhānāṭṭhānañca paripucchantassa paripucchā paṭibhāti,
atk-s0516a:670_6: so paripucchāpaṭibhānavā. Yena maggādayo paṭividdhā honti, so adhigamapaṭibhānavā.
atk-s0516a:670_7: Taṃ evarūpaṃ bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha, mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ. Tato
atk-s0516a:670_9: vā anekappakārāni aññāya atthāni, tato “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādīsu
atk-s0516a:670_10: kaṅkhāṭṭhānesu vineyya kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchaṃ vinetvā vināsetvā evaṃ katasabbakicco
atk-s0516a:672_0: 145. Pañcame khiḍḍā ca rati ca pubbe vuttāva. Kāmasukhanti vatthukāmasukhaṃ. Vatthukāmāpi
atk-s0516a:672_1: hi sukhassa visayādibhāvena sukhanti vuccanti. Yathāha – “atthi rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatita”nti.
atk-s0516a:672_2: Evametaṃ khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca imasmiṃ okāsaloke analaṅkaritvā alanti akatvā
atk-s0516a:672_3: “etaṃ tappaka”nti vā “sārabhūta”nti vā evaṃ aggahetvā. Anapekkhamānoti tena analaṅkaraṇena
atk-s0516a:672_4: anapekkhanasīlo apihāluko nittaṇho. Vibhūsaṭṭhānāvirato saccavādī eko careti. Tattha
atk-s0516a:672_5: vibhūsā duvidhā agārikavibhūsā ca anagārikavibhūsā ca. Tattha agārikavibhūsā sākaṭaveṭhanamālāgandhādi,
atk-s0516a:672_6: anagārikavibhūsā ca pattamaṇḍanādi. Vibhūsā eva vibhūsaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā vibhūsaṭṭhānā
atk-s0516a:672_7: tividhāyapi viratiyā virato. Avitathavacanato saccavādīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0516a:674_2: ca. Bandhavānīti ñātibandhu, gottabandhu, mittabandhu, sippabandhuvasena catubbidhabandhave.
atk-s0516a:676_0: 147. Sattame saṅgo esoti attano upabhogaṃ niddisati. So hi sajjanti tattha pāṇino
atk-s0516a:676_1: kaddame paviṭṭho hatthī viyāti saṅgo. Parittamettha sokhyanti ettha pañcakāmaguṇūpabhogakāle
atk-s0516a:676_2: viparītasaññāya uppādetabbato kāmāvacaradhammapariyāpannato vā lāmakaṭṭhena sokhyaṃ
atk-s0516a:676_3: parittaṃ, vijjuppabhāya obhāsitanaccadassanasukhaṃ viya ittaraṃ, tāvakālikanti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:676_4: hoti. Appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyoti ettha ca yvāyaṃ “yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca
atk-s0516a:676_5: kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti vutto, so yamidaṃ
atk-s0516a:676_6: “ko ca, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ ādīnavo, idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippaṭṭhānena
atk-s0516a:676_7: jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāyā”ti evamādinā nayenettha dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0516a:676_8: taṃ upanidhāya appodakabindumatto hoti, atha kho dukkhameva bhiyyo bahu, catūsu samuddesu
atk-s0516a:676_9: udakasadiso hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyo”ti. Gaḷo esoti assādaṃ
atk-s0516a:676_10: dassetvā ākaḍḍhanavasena baḷiso viya eso, yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā. Iti ñatvā matimāti
atk-s0516a:676_11: evaṃ ñatvā buddhimā paṇḍito puriso sabbampetaṃ pahāya eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0516a:678_0: 148. Aṭṭhamagāthāya dutiyapāde jālanti suttamayaṃ vuccati. Ambūti udakaṃ, tattha
atk-s0516a:678_1: caratīti ambucārī, macchassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Salile ambucārī salilambucārī. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0516a:678_2: nadīsalile jālaṃ bhetvā gataambucārīvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatiyapāde daḍḍhanti daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:678_3: vuccati. Yathā aggi daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ puna na nivattati, na tattha bhiyyo āgacchati,
atk-s0516a:678_4: evaṃ maggañāṇagginā daḍḍhaṃ kāmaguṇaṭṭhānaṃ anivattamāno, tattha bhiyyo anāgacchantoti
atk-s0516a:679_0: Saṃyojanānīti yassa saṃvijjanti, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni.
atk-s0516a:679_1: Imāni pana saṃyojanāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni
atk-s0516a:679_5: sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti, kāmarāgapaṭighā anāgāmimaggena, mānabhavarāgaavijjā arahattamaggenāti.
atk-s0516a:679_6: Bhinditvāti bhedaṃ pāpetvā. Pabhinditvāti chindaṃ katvā. Dālayitvāti phāletvā. Padālayitvāti
atk-s0516a:681_0: 149. Navame okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhākhittacakkhu, satta gīvaṭṭhīni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0516a:681_1: parivajjanapahātabbadassanatthaṃ yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti vuttaṃ hoti. Na tu hanukaṭṭhinā
atk-s0516a:681_2: hadayaṭṭhiṃ saṅghaṭṭento. Evañhi okkhittacakkhutā na samaṇasārūppā hoti. Na ca pādaloloti
atk-s0516a:681_3: ekassa dutiyo dvinnaṃ tatiyoti evaṃ gaṇamajjhaṃ, pavisitukāmatāya kaṇḍūyamānapādo
atk-s0516a:681_4: viya abhavanto, dīghacārikaanavaṭṭhitacārikavirato vā. Guttindriyoti chasu indriyesu
atk-s0516a:681_5: idha manindriyassa visuṃ vuttattā vuttāvasesavasena gopitindriyo. Rakkhitamānasānoti
atk-s0516a:681_6: mānasaṃyeva mānasānaṃ, taṃ rakkhitamassāti rakkhitamānasāno. Yathā kileseti na viluppati,
atk-s0516a:681_7: evaṃ rakkhitacittoti vuttaṃ hoti. Anavassutoti imāya paṭipattiyā tesu tesu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0516a:681_8: kilesaanvāssavavirahito. Apariḍayhamānoti evaṃ anvāssavavirahitā eva kilesaggīhi
atk-s0516a:681_9: apariḍayhamāno, bahiddhā vā anavassuto, ajjhattaṃ apariḍayhamāno. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0516a:682: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena “cakkhū”ti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā panāhu –
atk-s0516a:683_0: “Cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā, cittaṃ na passati acakkhukattā, dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭane
atk-s0516a:683_1: pana pasādavatthukena cittena passati. Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu viya
atk-s0516a:683_2: sasambhārakathā nāma hoti, tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho”ti.
atk-s0516a:684_0: Nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0516a:684_1: chandarāgavasena gaṇhāti, diṭṭhamattavasena na saṇṭhāti. Anubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ
atk-s0516a:684_2: anubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato “anubyañjana”nti laddhavohāraṃ hatthapādahasitalapitavilokitādibhedaṃ ākāraṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0516a:685_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu. Etaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0516a:685_1: satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo
atk-s0516a:685_2: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ. Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena
atk-s0516a:685_3: pidahanatthāya na paṭipajjati. Evaṃbhūtoyeva ca “na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ. Na cakkhundriye
atk-s0516a:686_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi. Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya
atk-s0516a:686_1: sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati, api ca yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0516a:686_2: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā
atk-s0516a:686_3: uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ
atk-s0516a:686_5: voṭṭhapanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tadanantaraṃ javanaṃ javati.
atk-s0516a:686_6: Tatrāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye, na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro
atk-s0516a:686_7: vā atthi, javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti
atk-s0516a:686_8: vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati, asaṃvaro hoti. Evaṃ honto pana so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti
atk-s0516a:686_9: vuccati. Kasmā? Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni
atk-s0516a:686_10: vīthicittānipi. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo
atk-s0516a:686_11: susaṃvutā, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārena
atk-s0516a:686_12: hi pavisitvā corā yadicchanti, taṃ hareyyuṃ. Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0516a:686_13: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipīti.
atk-s0516a:687_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hotītiādīsu na nimittaggāhī hotīti chandarāgavasena
atk-s0516a:687_1: vuttappakāraṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti. Evaṃ sesapadānipi vuttapaṭikkhepena veditabbāni.
atk-s0516a:687_2: Yathā ca heṭṭhā “javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ
atk-s0516a:687_3: hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipī”ti vuttaṃ, evamidha tasmiṃ sīlādīsu
atk-s0516a:687_4: uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi. Yathā kiṃ?
atk-s0516a:687_5: Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti. Tathāpi antonagare
atk-s0516a:687_6: sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti. Nagaradvāresu pihitesu corānaṃ paveso
atk-s0516a:687_7: natthi. Evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni
atk-s0516a:687_8: vīthicittānipi. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
atk-s0516a:688: Avassutapariyāyañcāti kilesehi tintakāraṇañca. Anavassutapariyāyañcāti kilesehi atintakāraṇañca.
atk-s0516a:689: Piyarūpe rūpeti iṭṭhajātike rūpārammaṇe. Appiyarūpe rūpeti aniṭṭhasabhāve rūpārammaṇe. Byāpajjatīti dosavasena pūtibhāvamāpajjati. Otāranti chiddaṃ antaraṃ. Ārammaṇanti paccayaṃ.
atk-s0516a:690: Adhibhaṃsūti maddaṃsu. Na adhibhosīti na maddi. Bahalamattikāti punappunaṃ dānavasena uddhamāyikā bahalamattikā. Addāvalepanāti asukkhamattikadānā. Sesamettha uttānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:692: 150. Dasame kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvāti imassa pādassa gehā abhinikkhamitvā kāsāyavattho hutvāti evamattho veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0516a:696_1: sāyanīyesu. Gedhaṃ akaranti giddhiṃ akaronto, taṇhaṃ anuppādentoti vuttaṃ hoti. Aloloti
atk-s0516a:696_2: “idaṃ sāyissāmi, idaṃ sāyissāmī”ti evaṃ rasavisesesu anākulo. Anaññaposīti posetabbakasaddhivihārikādivirahito,
atk-s0516a:696_3: kāyasandhāraṇamattena santuṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā vā pubbe uyyāne rasesu gedhakaraṇalolo
atk-s0516a:696_4: hutvā aññaposī āsiṃ, evaṃ ahutvā yāya taṇhāya lolo hutvā rasesu gedhaṃ karoti, taṃ
atk-s0516a:696_5: taṇhaṃ hitvā āyatiṃ taṇhāmūlakassa aññassa attabhāvassa anibbattanena anaññaposīti
atk-s0516a:696_6: dasseti. Atha vā atthabhañjanakaṭṭhena kilesā “aññe”ti vuccanti, tesaṃ aposanena
atk-s0516a:696_7: anaññaposīti ayamettha attho. Sapadānacārīti avokkammacārī anupubbacārī, gharapaṭipāṭiṃ
atk-s0516a:696_8: achaḍḍetvā aḍḍhakulañca daliddakulañca nirantaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisamānoti attho. Kule
atk-s0516a:696_9: kule appaṭibaddhacittoti khattiyakulādīsu yattha katthaci kilesavasena alaggacitto,
atk-s0516a:696_10: candūpamo niccanavako hutvāti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0516a:698_0: 152. Dutiye āvaraṇānīti nīvaraṇāneva, tāni atthato uragasutte vuttāni. Tāni pana
atk-s0516a:698_1: yasmā abbhādayo viya candaṃ sūriyaṃ vā ceto āvaranti, tasmā “āvaraṇāni cetaso”ti
atk-s0516a:698_2: vuttāni. Tāni upacārena vā appanāya vā pahāya. Upakkileseti upagamma cittaṃ vibādhente
atk-s0516a:698_3: akusale dhamme, vatthopamādīsu vutte abhijjhādayo vā. Byapanujjāti panuditvā vināsetvā,
atk-s0516a:698_4: vipassanāmaggena pajahitvāti attho. Sabbeti anavasese. Evaṃ samathavipassanāsampanno
atk-s0516a:698_5: paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhinissayassa pahīnattā anissito. Sesamaggehi chetvā tedhātukagataṃ
atk-s0516a:698_6: sinehadosaṃ, taṇhārāganti vuttaṃ hoti. Sineho eva hi guṇapaṭipakkhato sinehadosoti
atk-s0516a:700_0: 153. Tatiye vipiṭṭhikatvānāti piṭṭhito katvā, chaḍḍetvā jahitvāti attho. Sukhaṃ dukhañcāti
atk-s0516a:700_1: kāyikaṃ sātāsātaṃ. Somanassadomanassanti cetasikaṃ sātāsātaṃ. Upekkhanti catutthajjhānupekkhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:700_3: navahi paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā atisuddhaṃ, niddhantasuvaṇṇamiva vigatūpakkilesanti attho.
atk-s0516a:701_0: Ayaṃ pana yojanā – vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukkhañca pubbeva, paṭhamajjhānūpacārabhūmiyaṃyeva
atk-s0516a:701_1: dukkhaṃ, tatiyajjhānūpacārabhūmiyañca sukhanti adhippāyo. Puna ādito vuttaṃ ca-kāraṃ
atk-s0516a:701_2: parato netvā “somanassaṃ domanassañca vipiṭṭhikatvāna pubbevā”ti adhikāro. Tena somanassaṃ
atk-s0516a:701_3: catutthajjhānūpacāre, domanassañca dutiyajjhānūpacāreyevāti dīpeti. Etāni hi etesaṃ
atk-s0516a:701_4: pariyāyato pahānaṭṭhānāni. Nippariyāyato pana dukkhassa paṭhamajjhānaṃ, domanassassa
atk-s0516a:701_5: dutiyajjhānaṃ, sukhassa tatiyajjhānaṃ, somanassassa catutthajjhānaṃ pahānaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:701_6: Yathāha – “paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-s0516a:701_7: nirujjhatī”tiādi. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ. Parato pubbevāti tīsu
atk-s0516a:701_8: paṭhamajjhānadīsu dukkhadomanassasukhāni vipiṭṭhikatvā ettheva ca catutthajjhāne
atk-s0516a:701_9: somanassaṃ vipiṭṭhikatvā imāya paṭipadāya laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ eko
atk-s0516a:703_0: 154. Catutthe āraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ assāti āraddhaviriyo. Etena attano vīriyārambhaṃ ādivīriyaṃ
atk-s0516a:703_1: dasseti. Paramattho vuccati nibbānaṃ, tattha pattiyā paramatthapattiyā. Etena vīriyārambhena
atk-s0516a:703_2: pattabbaphalaṃ dasseti. Alīnacittoti etena vīriyupatthambhānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ alīnataṃ
atk-s0516a:703_3: dasseti. Akusītavuttīti etena ṭhānāsanacaṅkamādīsu kāyassa anavasīdanaṃ. Daḷhanikkamoti
atk-s0516a:703_4: etena “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ padahanavīriyaṃ dasseti. Yaṃ taṃ anupubbasikkhādīsu
atk-s0516a:703_5: padahanto “kāyena ceva paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca naṃ ativijjha passatī”ti
atk-s0516a:703_6: vuccati. Atha vā etena maggasampayuttavīriyaṃ dasseti. Tañhi daḷhañca bhāvanāpāripūrigatattā,
atk-s0516a:703_7: nikkamo ca sabbaso paṭipakkhā nikkhantattā, tasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalopi daḷho nikkamo
atk-s0516a:703_8: assāti “daḷhanikkamo”ti vuccati. Thāmabalūpapannoti maggakkhaṇe kāyathāmena ñāṇabalena
atk-s0516a:703_9: ca upapanno. Atha vā thāmabhūtena balena upapannoti thāmabalūpapanno, thirañāṇabalūpapannoti
atk-s0516a:703_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Etena tassa vīriyassa vipassanāñāṇasampayogaṃ dīpento yoniso padahanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0516a:703_11: sādheti. Pubbabhāgamajjhimaukkaṭṭhavīriyavasena vā tayopi pādā yojetabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0516a:705_0: 155. Pañcame paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallīnaṃ, ekattasevitā
atk-s0516a:705_1: ekībhāvo kāyavivekoti attho. Jhānanti paccanīkajhāpanato ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānato
atk-s0516a:705_2: ca cittaviveko vuccati. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nīvaraṇādipaccanīkajhāpanato kasiṇādiārammaṇūpanijjhānato
atk-s0516a:705_4: ca “jhāna”nti vuccati. Idha pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānameva adhippetaṃ. Evametaṃ paṭisallānañca
atk-s0516a:705_5: jhānañca ariñcamānoti ajahamāno anissajjamāno. Dhammesūti vipassanupagesu pañcakkhandhādidhammesu.
atk-s0516a:705_6: Niccanti satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ. Anudhammacārīti te dhamme ārabbha pavattamānena
atk-s0516a:705_7: anugataṃ vipassanādhammaṃ caramāno. Atha vā dhammesūti ettha dhammāti nava lokuttaradhammā,
atk-s0516a:705_8: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anulomo dhammoti anudhammo, vipassanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha “dhammānaṃ
atk-s0516a:705_10: vuttaṃ siyā. Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesūti tāya anudhammacāritāsaṅkhātāya vipassanāya
atk-s0516a:705_11: aniccākārādidosaṃ tīsu bhavesu samanupassanto evaṃ imāya kāyavivekacittavivekaṃ ariñcamāno
atk-s0516a:705_12: sikhāppattavipassanāsaṅkhātāya paṭipadāya adhigatoti vattabbo eko careti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:707_0: 156. Chaṭṭhe taṇhakkhayanti nibbānaṃ, evaṃ diṭṭhādīnavāya taṇhāya eva appavattiṃ.
atk-s0516a:707_1: Appamattoti sātaccakārī. Aneḷamūgoti alālāmukho. Atha vā aneḷo ca amūgo ca, paṇḍito
atk-s0516a:707_2: byattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Hitasukhasampāpakaṃ sutamassa atthīti sutavā, āgamasampannoti
atk-s0516a:707_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Satīmāti cirakatādīnaṃ anussaritā. Saṅkhātadhammoti dhammūpaparikkhāya
atk-s0516a:707_4: pariññātadhammo. Niyatoti ariyamaggena niyāmaṃ patto. Padhānavāti sammappadhānavīriyasampanno.
atk-s0516a:707_5: Uppaṭipāṭiyā esa pāṭho yojetabbo. Evametehi appamādādīhi samannāgato niyāmasampāpakena
atk-s0516a:707_6: padhānena padhānavā, tena padhānena pattaniyāmattā niyato, tato arahattappattiyā
atk-s0516a:707_7: saṅkhātadhammo. Arahā hi puna saṅkhātabbābhāvato “saṅkhātadhammo”ti vuccati. Yathāha
atk-s0516a:707_8: – “ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekkhā puthū idhā”ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0516a:709_0: 157. Sattame sīhoti cattāro sīhā – tiṇasīho, paṇḍusīho, kāḷasīho, kesarasīhoti. Tesaṃ
atk-s0516a:709_1: kesarasīho aggamakkhāyati, eso idha adhippeto. Vāto puratthimādivasena anekavidho.
atk-s0516a:709_2: Padumaṃ rattasetādivasena. Tesu yo koci vāto yaṃ kiñci padumaṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattha
atk-s0516a:709_3: yasmā santāso attasinehena hoti, attasineho ca taṇhālepo, sopi diṭṭhisampayuttena
atk-s0516a:709_4: vā diṭṭhivippayuttena vā lobhena hoti, sopi ca taṇhāyeva. Sajjanaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhāvirahitassa
atk-s0516a:709_5: mohena hoti, moho ca avijjā. Tattha samathena taṇhāya pahānaṃ hoti, vipassanāya avijjāya.
atk-s0516a:709_6: Tasmā samathena attasinehaṃ pahāya sīho viya saddesu aniccadukkhādīsuasantasanto,
atk-s0516a:709_7: vipassanāya mohaṃ pahāya vātova jālamhi khandhāyatanādīsu asajjamāno, samatheneva
atk-s0516a:709_8: lobhaṃ, lobhasampayuttaṃ eva diṭṭhiñca pahāya, padumaṃva toyena sabbabhavabhogalobhena alippamāno.
atk-s0516a:710_0: Ettha ca samathassa sīlaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, samatho samādhi, vipassanā paññāti evaṃ tesu
atk-s0516a:710_1: dvīsu dhammesu siddhesu tayopi khandhā siddhā honti. Tattha sīlakkhandhena surato
atk-s0516a:710_2: hoti, so sīhova saddhesu āghātavatthūsu akujjhitukāmatāya na santasati, paññākkhandhena
atk-s0516a:710_3: paṭividdhasabhāvo vātova jālamhi khandhādidhammabhede na sajjati, samādhikkhandhena
atk-s0516a:710_4: vītarāgo padumaṃva toyena rāgena na lippati. Evaṃ samathavipassanāhi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi
atk-s0516a:710_5: ca yathāsambhavaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ, tiṇṇañca akusalamūlānaṃ pahānavasena asantasanto
atk-s0516a:710_6: asajjamāno alippamāno ca veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0516a:712_0: 158. Aṭṭhame sahanā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho. Kesarasīhova idha adhippeto.
atk-s0516a:712_1: Dāṭhā balamassa atthīti dāṭhabalī. Pasayha abhibhuyyāti ubhayaṃ cārīsaddena saha
atk-s0516a:712_2: yojetabbaṃ pasayhacārī abhibhuyyacārīti. Tattha pasayha niggayha pavāhetvā caraṇena
atk-s0516a:712_3: pasayhacārī. Abhibhavitvā santāsetvā vasīkatvā caraṇena abhibhuyhacārī. Svāyaṃ kāyabalena
atk-s0516a:712_4: pasayhacārī, tejasā abhibhuyyacārī. Tattha sace koci vadeyya “kiṃ pasayha abhibhuyyacārī”ti.
atk-s0516a:712_5: Tato migānanti sāmivacanaṃ upayogatthe katvā “mige pasayha abhibhuyyacārī”ti paṭivattabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:712_6: Pantānīti dūrāni. Senāsanānīti vasanaṭṭhānāni. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0516a:714_0: 159. Navame “sabbe sattā sukhitā bhavantū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhūpanayanakāmatā
atk-s0516a:714_1: mettā. “Aho vata imamhā dukkhā vimucceyyu”ntiādinā nayena ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā
atk-s0516a:714_2: karuṇā. “Modanti vata bhonto sattā, modanti sādhu suṭṭhū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhāvippayogakāmatā
atk-s0516a:714_3: muditā. “Paññāyissanti sakena kammenā”ti sukhadukkhesu ajjhupekkhanatā upekkhā. Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0516a:714_4: pana uppaṭipāṭiyā mettaṃ vatvā upekkhā vuttā, muditā ca pacchā. Vimuttinti catassopi
atk-s0516a:714_5: hi vimuttī. Etā attano paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā vimuttiyo. Tena vuttaṃ – “mettaṃ
atk-s0516a:714_6: upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle”ti.
atk-s0516a:715_0: Tattha āsevamānoti tisso tikacatukkajjhānavasena bhāvayamāno, upekkhaṃ catutthajjhānavasena
atk-s0516a:715_1: bhāvayamāno. Kāleti mettaṃ āsevitvā tato vuṭṭhāya karuṇaṃ, tato vuṭṭhāya muditaṃ,
atk-s0516a:715_2: tato itarato vā nippītikajjhānato vuṭṭhāya upekkhaṃ āsevamānova “kāle āsevamāno”ti
atk-s0516a:715_3: vuccati, āsevituṃ phāsukāle vā. Sabbena lokena avirujjhamānoti dasasu disāsu sabbena
atk-s0516a:715_4: sattalokena avirujjhamāno. Mettādīnañhi bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikkūlā honti, sattesupi
atk-s0516a:715_5: virodhabhūto paṭigho vūpasammati. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno”ti.
atk-s0516a:717_0: 160. Dasame saṃyojanānīti dasa saṃyojanāni, tāni ca tena tena maggena sandālayitvāna.
atk-s0516a:717_1: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhīti jīvitasaṅkhayo vuccati cuticittassa paribhedo, tasmiñca
atk-s0516a:717_2: jīvitasaṅkhaye jīvitanikantiyā pahīnattā asantasanti. Ettāvatā saupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ
atk-s0516a:717_3: attano dassetvā gāthāpariyosāne anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0516a:719_0: 161. Ekādasame bhajantīti sarīrena allīyitvā payirupāsanti. Sevantīti añjalikammādīhi
atk-s0516a:719_1: kiṃkārapaṭissāvitāya ca paricaranti. Kāraṇaṃ attho etesanti kāraṇatthā, bhajanāya
atk-s0516a:719_2: sevanāya ca nāññaṃ kāraṇamatthi, attho eva tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, atthahetu sevantīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:719_3: hoti. Nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittāti “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti evaṃ attapaṭilābhakāraṇena
atk-s0516a:720: “Upakāro ca yo mitto, sukhe dukkhe ca yo sakhā;
atk-s0516a:721: Atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo ca mittānukampako”ti. –
atk-s0516a:722_0: Evaṃ vuttena ariyena mittabhāvena samannāgatā dullabhā ajja mittā. Attani ṭhitā etesaṃ
atk-s0516a:722_1: paññā, attānaṃyeva olokenti, na aññanti attaṭṭhapaññā. “Diṭṭhatthapaññā”ti ayampi
atk-s0516a:722_2: kira porāṇapāṭho. Sampati diṭṭheyeva atthe etesaṃ paññā, āyatiṃ na pekkhantīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0516a:722_3: hoti. Asucīti asucinā anariyena kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatāti. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-s0516a:722_4: veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ antarantarā ativitthārabhayena na vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ pāṭhānusāreneva
atk-s0516a:732: Yo tassa dakkhiṇe bhāge, mahāvihāro patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0516a:733: Yo tassa tilako bhūto, mahāthūpo siluccayo;
atk-s0516a:734: Yaṃ tassa pacchime bhāge, lekho kathikasaññito.
atk-s0516a:751: Ānuṭṭhubhena assā, chando baddhena gaṇiyamānā tu;
atk-s0516a:754: Puññaṃ imaṃ racayatā, yaṃ pattamanappakaṃ vipulaṃ.
